  2527                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2528                                  
  2529                                  ;************************************************************************
  2530                                  ;*									*
  2531                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2532                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2533                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2534                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2535                                  ;*									*
  2536                                  ;************************************************************************
  2537                                  
  2538                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2539 00000743 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2540 00000749 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2541                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2542 0000074B 50                      		push	ax
  2543 0000074C 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2544 00000750 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2545 00000755 58                      		pop	ax
  2546 00000756 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2547                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2548                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2549                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2550 00000758 2EFF2E[DE06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2551                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2552                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2553                                  
  2554                                  not_from_dos:				
  2555 0000075D E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2556 00000760 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2557                                  
  2558                                  ;************************************************************************
  2559                                  ;*									*
  2560                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2561                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2562                                  ;*									*
  2563                                  ;************************************************************************
  2564                                  
  2565                                  outchr:					
  2566 00000762 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2567 00000763 56                      		push	si
  2568 00000764 57                      		push	di
  2569 00000765 55                      		push	bp
  2570 00000766 53                      		push	bx
  2571 00000767 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2572 00000769 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2573 0000076C CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2574                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2575                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2576 0000076E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2577 0000076F 5D                      		pop	bp
  2578 00000770 5F                      		pop	di
  2579 00000771 5E                      		pop	si
  2580 00000772 58                      		pop	ax
  2581 00000773 CF                      		iret
  2582                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2583                                  
  2584                                  ;************************************************************************
  2585                                  ;*									*
  2586                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2587                                  ;*									*
  2588                                  ;************************************************************************
  2589                                  
  2590                                  block13:				
  2591 00000774 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2592 0000077A 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2593 0000077C E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2594 0000077F 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2595 00000781 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2596                                  
  2597                                  skipa20:				
  2598 00000784 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2599 00000789 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2600 0000078A 2EFF1E[EA06]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2601                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2602                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2603 0000078F 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2604 00000794 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2605                                  
  2606                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2607                                  
  2608                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2609                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2610                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2611                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2612                                  
  2613                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2614 00000797 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2615 0000079B 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2616 0000079C 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2617                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2618 000007A1 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2619 000007A6 0E                      		push	cs
  2620 000007A7 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2621                                  
  2622 000007A8 9C                      		pushf
  2623                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2624                                  		; ds = cs
  2625 000007A9 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2626                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2627 000007AE 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2628 000007B0 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2629 000007B3 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2630 000007B5 E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2631                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2632 000007B8 9D                      		popf
  2633 000007B9 CB                      		retf
  2634                                  
  2635                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2636                                  
  2637                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2638                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022
  2639                                  
  2640 000007BA 9000FFFF                HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h		
  2641 000007BE 80000000                LoMem:		dd 80h
  2642                                  
  2643                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------			
  2644                                  
  2645                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2646                                  
  2647                                  
  2648                                  ;************************************************************************
  2649                                  ;*									*
  2650                                  ;*	EnsureA20On - ensure that a20 is enabled if we're running	*
  2651                                  ;*	  in the HMA before interrupt entry points into Bios_Code	*
  2652                                  ;*									*
  2653                                  ;************************************************************************
  2654                                  
  2655                                  EnsureA20On:	; proc near		
  2656 000007C2 E80E00                  		call	IsA20Off
  2657                                  		;jz	short EnableA20
  2658                                  		;retn
  2659                                  		; 18/12/2022
  2660 000007C5 750B                    		jnz	short A20On_retn	
  2661                                  
  2662                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2663                                  
  2664                                  
  2665                                  EnableA20:	; proc near		
  2666 000007C7 50                      		push	ax
  2667 000007C8 53                      		push	bx
  2668 000007C9 B405                    		mov	ah, 5	 ; local enable a20
  2669                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2670 000007CB 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms] ; 16/10/2022
  2671 000007D0 5B                      		pop	bx
  2672 000007D1 58                      		pop	ax
  2673                                  A20On_retn:	; 18/12/2022	
  2674 000007D2 C3                      		retn
  2675                                  
  2676                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2677                                  
  2678                                  
  2679                                  IsA20Off:	; proc near		
  2680 000007D3 1E                      		push	ds
  2681 000007D4 06                      		push	es
  2682 000007D5 51                      		push	cx
  2683 000007D6 56                      		push	si
  2684 000007D7 57                      		push	di
  2685 000007D8 2EC536[BA07]            		lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2686 000007DD 2EC43E[BE07]            		les	di, [cs:LoMem]
  2687 000007E2 B90800                  		mov	cx, 8
  2688 000007E5 F3A7                    		repe cmpsw
  2689 000007E7 5F                      		pop	di
  2690 000007E8 5E                      		pop	si
  2691 000007E9 59                      		pop	cx
  2692 000007EA 07                      		pop	es
  2693 000007EB 1F                      		pop	ds
  2694 000007EC C3                      		retn
  2695                                  
  2696                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2697                                  
  2698                                  DisableA20:
  2699 000007ED 50                      		push	ax
  2700 000007EE 53                      		push	bx
  2701 000007EF B406                    		mov	ah, 6		; local disable A20
  2702 000007F1 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms]
  2703                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2704 000007F6 5B                      		pop	bx
  2705 000007F7 58                      		pop	ax
  2706 000007F8 C3                      		retn
  2707                                  
  2708                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2709                                  
  2710                                  ;************************************************************************
  2711                                  ;*									*
  2712                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2713                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2714                                  ;*									*
  2715                                  ;************************************************************************
  2716                                  
  2717                                  int19:					
  2718 000007F9 0E                      		push	cs
  2719 000007FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2720 000007FB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022
  2721 000007FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  2722                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2723 00000802 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2724                                  next_int:				
  2725 00000805 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2726 00000806 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2727 00000807 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2728 00000809 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2729 0000080B 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2730 0000080D AD                      		lodsw
  2731 0000080E AB                      		stosw
  2732 0000080F AD                      		lodsw
  2733 00000810 AB                      		stosw			; install the saved vector
  2734 00000811 E2F2                    		loop	next_int
  2735 00000813 803E[4006]00            		cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  2736 00000818 7422                    		jz	short doint19
  2737 0000081A BE[4106]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2738                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2739 0000081D B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2740                                  
  2741                                  i19_restore_loop:			
  2742 00000820 AC                      		lodsb			; get interrupt	number
  2743 00000821 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2744 00000822 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2745 00000824 AD                      		lodsw			; get original vector offset
  2746 00000825 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2747 00000827 AD                      		lodsw
  2748 00000828 83FBFF                  		cmp	bx, 0FFFFh	; check	for 0ffffh (unlikely segment)
  2749 0000082B 740D                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too
  2750 0000082D 83F8FF                  		cmp	ax, 0FFFFh	; opt 0ffffh is	unlikely offset
  2751 00000830 7408                    		jz	short i19_restor_1
  2752 00000832 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2753 00000834 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2754 00000836 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2755 00000837 AB                      		stosw
  2756 00000838 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2757 00000839 AB                      		stosw			; put the vector back
  2758                                  
  2759                                  i19_restor_1:				
  2760 0000083A E2E4                    		loop	i19_restore_loop
  2761                                  
  2762                                  doint19:				
  2763 0000083C 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; ; Is dos running from	HMA
  2764 00000841 7403                    		jz	short SkipVDisk
  2765 00000843 E83000                  		call	EraseVDiskHead	; Then erase our VDISK header at 1MB boundary
  2766                                  					; Some m/c's (AST 386 & HP QS/16 do not clear
  2767                                  					; the memory above 1MB during a	warm boot.
  2768                                  SkipVDisk:				
  2769 00000846 CD19                    		int	19h		; DISK BOOT
  2770                                  					; causes reboot	of disk	system
  2771                                  
  2772                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2773                                  
  2774                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2775                                  ;
  2776                                  ; procedure : int15
  2777                                  ;
  2778                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2779                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2780                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2781                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2782                                  ;
  2783                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2784                                  
  2785                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2786                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2787                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2788                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2789                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2790                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2791                                  
  2792                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2793                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2794 00000848 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2795 0000084B 7405                    		jz	short int15_1
  2796 0000084D 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2797                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2798                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2799                                  
  2800                                  int15_1:				
  2801 00000852 1E                      		push	ds
  2802 00000853 50                      		push	ax
  2803 00000854 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2804 00000857 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2805                                  		;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2806                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2807 00000859 A01700                  		mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2808 0000085C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2809 0000085E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2810 00000860 750C                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2811 00000862 0E                      		push	cs
  2812 00000863 1F                      		pop	ds
  2813 00000864 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2814 00000869 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2815 0000086B E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2816                                  int15_2:				
  2817 0000086E 58                      		pop	ax
  2818 0000086F 1F                      		pop	ds
  2819 00000870 F9                      		stc
  2820 00000871 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2821                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2822                                  
  2823                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2824                                  
  2825                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2826                                  ;
  2827                                  ; procedure : EraseVDiskHead
  2828                                  ;
  2829                                  ;		Erases the VDisk Header present in the 1MB boundary
  2830                                  ;
  2831                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2832                                  
  2833                                  EraseVDiskHead:	; proc near		
  2834 00000876 50                      		push	ax
  2835 00000877 51                      		push	cx
  2836 00000878 57                      		push	di
  2837 00000879 06                      		push	es
  2838 0000087A E845FF                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2839 0000087D B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; HMA seg
  2840 00000880 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  2841 00000882 BF1000                  		mov	di, 10h		; point	to VDISK header
  2842 00000885 B91000                  		mov	cx, 10h		; size of vdisk	header
  2843 00000888 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  2844 0000088A F3AB                    		rep stosw		; clear	it
  2845 0000088C 07                      		pop	es
  2846 0000088D 5F                      		pop	di
  2847 0000088E 59                      		pop	cx
  2848 0000088F 58                      		pop	ax
  2849 00000890 C3                      		retn
  2850                                  
  2851                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2852

  2857                                  ;*	  notice that we'll assume we're being entered from DOS, so	*

  2893                                  
  2894                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2895                                  
  2896                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  2897                                  ;
  2898                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2899                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  2900                                  
  2901 0000089A 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  2902                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  2903 0000089C 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  2904 000008A0 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  2905 000008A4 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  2906 000008A8 [AC08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  2907 000008AA 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  2908                                  
  2909                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  2910                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  2911                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  2912                                  
  2913 000008AC 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  2914 000008B0 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  2915 000008B2 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  2916 000008B6 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  2917 000008B8 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  2918 000008BA 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  2919 000008BC 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  2920                                  
  2921                                  NextStack:
  2922                                  
  2923                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  2924                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  2925                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  2926                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  2927                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  2928                                  
  2929 000008BE 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  2930 000008C2 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  2931 000008C4 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  2932 000008C8 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  2933 000008CA 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  2934                                  
  2935                                  					;SR;
  2936 000008CE 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  2937                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  2938                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2939                                  
  2940                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  2941                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  2942                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  2943                                  
  2944                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  2945 000008CF 57                      		push	di
  2946 000008D0 06                      		push	es
  2947 000008D1 53                      		push	bx
  2948 000008D2 50                      		push	ax
  2949 000008D3 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  2950 000008D5 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  2951 000008D7 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  2952 000008DA B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  2953 000008DD CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  2954                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  2955                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  2956 000008DF 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  2957 000008E1 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  2958 000008E3 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  2959                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  2960 000008E5 0E                      		push	cs
  2961                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  2962 000008E6 B8[F008]                		mov	ax, Skip
  2963 000008E9 50                      		push	ax
  2964 000008EA 06                      		push	es
  2965 000008EB 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  2966 000008EC B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  2967 000008EF CB                      		retf			; do the call
  2968                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2969                                  
  2970                                  Skip:					
  2971 000008F0 58                      		pop	ax
  2972 000008F1 5B                      		pop	bx
  2973 000008F2 07                      		pop	es
  2974 000008F3 5F                      		pop	di
  2975 000008F4 CB                      		retf
  2976                                  
  2977                                  ;End WIN386 support

  3250                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3251                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3252                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3253                                  
  3254                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3255                                  
  3256                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3257                                  ;
  3258                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3259                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3260                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3261                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3262                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3263                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3264                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3265                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3266                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3267                                  ;
  3268                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3269                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3270                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3271                                  ;
  3272                                  ;	uses:	
  3273                                  ;
  3274                                  ;
  3275                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3276                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3277                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3278                                  ;
  3279                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3280                                  
  3281                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3282                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3283                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3284                                  
  3285                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3286                                  
  3287                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3288                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3289                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3290                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3291                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3292                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3293                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3294                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3295                                  
  3296                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3297                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3298                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3299                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3300                                  
  3301                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3302 000012DC 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3303 000012DF 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3304 000012E1 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3305 000012E4 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3306 000012E6 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3307 000012E9 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3308                                  atd1:
  3309 000012EB 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3310                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3311                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3312                                  
  3313                                  atd2:					
  3314 000012F0 53                      		push	bx
  3315 000012F1 51                      		push	cx
  3316 000012F2 52                      		push	dx
  3317 000012F3 57                      		push	di
  3318 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
  3319 000012F5 06                      		push	es
  3320 000012F6 50                      		push	ax
  3321 000012F7 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3322                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3323 000012FA 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3324                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3325 000012FC C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3326                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3327                                  					; initially no error code.
  3328 00001301 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3329 00001304 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3330                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3331 00001308 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3332                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3333 0000130A C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3334 0000130F EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3335                                  					; return
  3336                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3337                                  
  3338                                  atd3:					
  3339 00001311 53                      		push	bx
  3340 00001312 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3341 00001314 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3342 00001317 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3343 00001319 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3344 0000131B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3345 0000131C 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3346 0000131F 0E                      		push	cs
  3347 00001320 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3348 00001323 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3349 00001325 58                      		pop	ax
  3350 00001326 50                      		push	ax
  3351 00001327 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3352 0000132A BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3353 0000132D EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3354 0000132E E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3355                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3356                                  
  3357                                  atd4:	
  3358                                  
  3359                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3360                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3361                                  				
  3362 00001331 58                      		pop	ax
  3363                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3364 00001332 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3365 00001336 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3366 00001338 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3367 0000133A F9                      		stc
  3368                                  atd5:					
  3369 0000133B 07                      		pop	es
  3370 0000133C 1F                      		pop	ds
  3371 0000133D 5F                      		pop	di
  3372 0000133E 5A                      		pop	dx
  3373 0000133F 59                      		pop	cx
  3374 00001340 5B                      		pop	bx
  3375 00001341 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3376                                  
  3377                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3378                                  
  3379                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3380                                  ;
  3381                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3382                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3383                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3384                                  ;	
  3385                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3386                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3387                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3388                                  ;
  3389                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3390                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3391                                  ;
  3392                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3393                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3394                                  
  3395                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3396                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3397                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3398 00001344 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3399                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3400 00001347 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3401 0000134C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3402 0000134F 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3403 00001351 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3404                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3405                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3406                                  setc1:					
  3407 00001356 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3408 00001358 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3409                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3410                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3411 0000135A A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3412 0000135D 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3413 00001361 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3414 00001363 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3415                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3416 00001366 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3417 00001369 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3418 0000136B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3419 0000136E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3420 00001371 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3421 00001373 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3422                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3423 00001375 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3424 00001378 06                      		push	es
  3425 00001379 53                      		push	bx
  3426 0000137A 0E                      		push	cs
  3427 0000137B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3428 0000137E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3429                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3430 00001382 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3431                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3432 00001385 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3433                                  					; only use low part
  3434 00001388 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3435                                  					; control byte modifier
  3436 0000138C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3437 0000138D 07                      		pop	es
  3438                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3439 0000138E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3440 00001392 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3441 00001395 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3442                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3443 00001397 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3444 0000139B C3                      		retn
  3445                                  
  3446                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3447                                  
  3448                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3449                                  ;
  3450                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3451                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3452                                  ;
  3453                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3454                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3455                                  ;
  3456                                  ;	
  3457                                  ;
  3458                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3459                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3460                                  ;
  3461                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3462                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3463                                  
  3464                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3465 0000139C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3466 0000139E 0E                      		push	cs
  3467 0000139F E84000                  		call	command
  3468 000013A2 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3469                                  doc1:					
  3470 000013A4 0E                      		push	cs
  3471 000013A5 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3472 000013A8 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3473 000013AA B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3474 000013AD BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3475 000013B0 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3476 000013B1 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3477                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3478                                  
  3479                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3480                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3481                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3482                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3483                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3484                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3485                                  ;
  3486                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3487                                  
  3488                                  rsct_loop:				
  3489 000013B2 6D                      		insw
  3490 000013B3 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3491 000013B5 FB                      		sti
  3492                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3493 000013B6 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3494                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3495                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3496 000013BB 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3497 000013BD 0E                      		push	cs
  3498 000013BE E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3499 000013C1 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3500 000013C3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3501 000013C6 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3502 000013C9 FA                      		cli
  3503 000013CA F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3504 000013CC FB                      		sti
  3505                                  doc2:					
  3506 000013CD 0E                      		push	cs
  3507 000013CE E82900                  		call	check_status
  3508 000013D1 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3509                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3510 000013D3 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3511 000013D7 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3512                                  doc3:					
  3513 000013D9 C3                      		retn
  3514                                  
  3515                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3516                                  
  3517                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3518                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3519                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3520                                  
  3521                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3522                                  
  3523                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3524                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3525                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3526                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3527                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3528                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3529                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3530                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3531                                  
  3532                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3533                                  ;
  3534                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3535                                  ;
  3536                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3537                                  ;
  3538                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3539                                  ;
  3540                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3541                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3542                                  ;	
  3543                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3544                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3545                                  
  3546                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3547                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3548                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3549                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3550 000013DA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3551 000013DD EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3552                                  
  3553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3554                                  
  3555                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3556                                  ;
  3557                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3558                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3559                                  ;
  3560                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3561                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3562                                  ;
  3563                                  ;
  3564                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3565                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3566                                  ;
  3567                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3568                                  
  3569                                  command:	; proc near		
  3570                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3571                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3572                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3573 000013E2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3574 000013E5 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3575                                  
  3576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3577                                  
  3578                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3579                                  ;
  3580                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3581                                  ;
  3582                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3583                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3584                                  ;
  3585                                  ;
  3586                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3587                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3588                                  ;		
  3589                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3590                                  
  3591                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3592                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3593                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3594                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3595 000013EA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3596 000013ED EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3597                                  
  3598                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3599                                  
  3600                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3601                                  ;
  3602                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3603                                  ;
  3604                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3605                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3606                                  ;
  3607                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3608                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3609                                  
  3610                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3611                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3612                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3613                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3614 000013F2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3615 000013F5 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3616

  3627                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.

  3635

  3637

  3641                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.

  3644                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.

  3650                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3651                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3652 00001402 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3653 00001405 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma

  3657                                  endatrom:
