  5800                                  
  5801                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  5802                                  ;
  5803                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  5804                                  
  5805                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  5806                                  
  5807                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5808                                  ; module name: remap
  5809                                  ;
  5810                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  5811                                  ;
  5812                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  5813                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  5814                                  ;
  5815                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  5816                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  5817                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5818                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5819                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5820                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5821                                  
  5822                                  ; input:       none
  5823                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  5824                                  ; exit error:  none
  5825                                  ; called from: msinit
  5826                                  ;
  5827                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  5828                                  ;	  found in the system
  5829                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  5830                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  5831                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  5832                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  5833                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  5834                                  ;
  5835                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5836                                  
  5837                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5838                                  ; 02/10/2022
  5839                                  
  5840                                  remap:		; proc near		
  5841 00001C77 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  5842                                  
  5843                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  5844                                  
  5845                                  drive_loop:				
  5846 00001C7C 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5847                                  					; first	hard disk??
  5848 00001C80 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  5849 00001C82 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5850                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  5851 00001C84 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1		; last bds?
  5852 00001C87 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  5853 00001C89 EB4F                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  5854                                  
  5855                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5856                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  5857                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  5858                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5859                                  
  5860                                  fdrv_found:				
  5861 00001C8B B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  5862                                  fdrv_loop:				
  5863 00001C8D 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5864                                  					; found	??
  5865 00001C90 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5866                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  5867                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  5868                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5869 00001C92 40                      		inc	ax
  5870 00001C93 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ??
  5871 00001C96 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk	drives
  5872                                  
  5873                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5874                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  5875                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  5876                                  ; any more.
  5877                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5878                                  
  5879 00001C98 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  5880                                  					; get first bds
  5881 00001C9D 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5882                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  5883 00001C9F 2E8A26[2501]            		mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  5884 00001CA4 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  5885                                  remap_loop1:				
  5886 00001CA7 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5887                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  5888 00001CA9 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5889 00001CAC FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  5890 00001CAE FECC                    		dec	ah		; count	down extra floppies
  5891 00001CB0 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  5892                                  
  5893                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  5894                                  
  5895 00001CB2 2EA0[CA16]              		mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  5896 00001CB6 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  5897 00001CB8 7220                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  5898 00001CBA 2E2A06[2501]            		sub	al, [cs:dsktnum] ; is it one of the other floppies?
  5899 00001CBF 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  5900                                  
  5901                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  5902                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  5903                                  
  5904 00001CC1 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  5905 00001CC3 EB05                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  5906                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5907                                  
  5908                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  5909                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  5910                                  
  5911                                  remap_boot_flop:			
  5912 00001CC5 2E0206[7500]            		add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  5913                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  5914 00001CCA 2EA2[CA16]              		mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  5915 00001CCE FEC0                    		inc	al
  5916 00001CD0 1E                      		push	ds
  5917 00001CD1 BF5004                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5918                                  		;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  5919 00001CD4 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  5920 00001CD6 A2[9602]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  5921                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  5922                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  5923 00001CD9 1F                      		pop	ds
  5924                                  rmap_exit:				
  5925 00001CDA C3                      		retn
  5926                                  
  5927                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5928                                  
  5929                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5930                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  5931                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  5932                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  5933                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  5934                                  ;**************************************************
  5935                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  5936                                  ;
  5937                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  5938                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  5939                                  ;
  5940                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  5941                                  ;**************************************************
  5942                                  
  5943                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5944                                  bootbias equ 200h
  5945                                  
  5946                                  getboot:	; proc near		
  5947                                  		
  5948                                  		; 08/04/2018
  5949                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  5950                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  5951                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5952                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  5953                                  
  5954 00001CDB 2EA1[D516]              		mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  5955 00001CDF 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  5956                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5957 00001CE1 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  5958                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  5959                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  5960 00001CE4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  5961 00001CE7 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  5962 00001CE9 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  5963 00001CEC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  5964                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  5965                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  5966                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  5967 00001CEE 7209                    		jb	short erret
  5968                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5969 00001CF0 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  5970                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  5971                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  5972 00001CF7 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  5973                                  erret:					
  5974 00001CF9 F9                      		stc
  5975                                  norm_ret:				
  5976 00001CFA C3                      		retn
  5977                                  
  5978                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5979                                  
  5980                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  5981                                  
  5982                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5983                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  5984                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  5985                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  5986                                  ;   determine version number
  5987                                  ;
  5988                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  5989                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  5990                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  5991                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  5992                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  5993                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  5994                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  5995                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5996                                  
  5997                                  sethard:	; proc near		
  5998                                  		; 14/08/2023
  5999                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6000 00001CFB 57                      		push	di
  6001 00001CFC 53                      		push	bx
  6002                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 14/08/2023
  6003 00001CFD 06                      		push	es
  6004 00001CFE 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6005 00001D01 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6006 00001D04 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6007                                  					; fnon_removable
  6008 00001D08 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6009                                  					; ffHardFile
  6010 00001D0C C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  6011 00001D11 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  6012 00001D13 52                      		push	dx
  6013 00001D14 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6014 00001D16 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6015                                  					; DL = drive number
  6016                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6017                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6018                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6019 00001D18 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  6020 00001D1A 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  6021 00001D1D 5A                      		pop	dx
  6022 00001D1E 7263                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  6023 00001D20 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  6024 00001D23 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6025 00001D26 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  6026 00001D27 E8B1FF                  		call	getboot
  6027 00001D2A 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  6028 00001D2B 7256                    		jb	short setret
  6029 00001D2D BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6030                                  
  6031                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  6032                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  6033                                  
  6034                                  act_part:				
  6035 00001D30 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  6036 00001D35 7418                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  6037 00001D37 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  6038 00001D3B 740C                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6039 00001D3D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6040 00001D41 7406                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6041 00001D43 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6042 00001D47 7506                    		jnz	short no_act
  6043                                  got_good_act:				
  6044 00001D49 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  6045 00001D4B 743A                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  6046 00001D4D FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  6047                                  no_act:					
  6048 00001D4F 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6049 00001D52 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6050                                  					; last entry done?
  6051 00001D56 75D8                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  6052 00001D58 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6053                                  					; restore original value of bx
  6054                                  
  6055                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  6056                                  
  6057                                  get_primary:				
  6058 00001D5B 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h

  6079                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6080                                  
  6081                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6082                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6083                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6084                                  ;
  6085                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6086                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6087                                  ;  without change.
  6088                                  ;
  6089                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6090                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6091                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.

  6495                                  ; ****** cas ---
  6496                                  ; IBM DOS 3.30 doesn't seem to mind that the TOTAL_SECTORS and
  6497                                  ; BIG_TOTAL_SECTORS field in the boot sector are 0000. This
  6498                                  ; happens with some frequency -- perhaps through some OS/2 setup
  6499                                  ; program. We haven't actually been COPYING the TOTAL_SECTORS
  6500                                  ; from the boot sector into the DPB anyway, we've just been using
  6501                                  ; it for calculating the fat size. Pretty scary, huh? For now,
  6502                                  ; we'll go ahead and copy it into the DPB, except in the case
  6503                                  ; that it equals zero, in which case we just use the values in
  6504                                  ; the DPB from the partition table.
  6505                                  
  6506                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6507                                  ;MOVMEDIAIDS equ mov_media_ids - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (751h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6508                                  ;CLEARIDS equ clear_ids - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (5D9h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

  6515                                  copybpb_fat:

  6564                                  
  6565                                  ;at this moment dx;ax = total sector number

  6683                                  scan:					
  6684                                  		;cmp	dx, [cs:si]	; total sectors hw
  6685                                  		; 14/08/2023 (ds=cs)

  6691 00001F88 7605                    		jbe	short gotparm

  6697                                  
  6698                                  gotparm:

  6702 00001F92 080E[D216]              		or	[fbigfat], cl	; (fbig flag, 40h or 0) ; 08/08/2023

  6705 00001F96 8B4C04                  		mov	cx, [si+4]
  6706                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:si+4]	; ch = number of sectors per cluster
  6707                                  					; cl = log base 2 of ch
  6708 00001F99 8B5406                  		mov	dx, [si+6]

  6710

  6712                                  
  6713 00001F9C 89550C                  		mov	[di+0Ch], dx	; [di+BDS.direntries]

  6721                                  		;test	ds:fbigfat, 40h	; fbig
  6722                                  					; if (fbigfat)
  6723 00001FAD 751E                    		jnz	short dobig	; goto dobig; (16 bit fat)
  6724                                  
  6725                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is gauranteed
  6726                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6727                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6728                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  6729                                  
  6730 00001FAF 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; (12 bit fat)
  6731 00001FB1 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch
  6732 00001FB3 4B                      		dec	bx
  6733 00001FB4 01C3                    		add	bx, ax		; dx=0
  6734 00001FB6 D3EB                    		shr	bx, cl		; bx = 1+(bpb->maxsec+BDS.secperclus-1)/
  6735 00001FB8 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus
  6736 00001FB9 80E3FE                  		and	bl, 0FEh	; bx &= ~1; (=number of clusters)
  6737 00001FBC 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  6738 00001FBE D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1
  6739 00001FC0 01F3                    		add	bx, si
  6740 00001FC2 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  6741 00001FC6 D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)
  6742 00001FC8 887D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bh	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6743                                  					; save number of fat sectors
  6744 00001FCB EB35                    		jmp	short massage_bpb
  6745                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6746                                  
  6747                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6748                                  
  6749                                  dobig:					
  6750 00001FCD B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6751 00001FCF 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6752 00001FD0 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6753 00001FD3 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6754 00001FD5 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6755 00001FD7 5A                      		pop	dx
  6756 00001FD8 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6757 00001FDB 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6758 00001FDE 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6759                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6760 00001FE1 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6761 00001FE3 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6762                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6763                                  
  6764                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6765                                  
  6766                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6767                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6768                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6769                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6770                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6771                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6772                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6773                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6774                                  		
  6775                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6776 00001FE6 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6777 00001FE8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6778 00001FEB 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6779 00001FEE 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6780                                  
  6781                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6782                                  
  6783 00001FF1 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6784                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6785 00001FF3 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6786                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6787                                  
  6788                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6789                                  
  6790                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6791                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  6792                                  		;
  6793                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  6794                                  		;; 17/10/2022
  6795                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6796                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  6797                                  
  6798                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6799                                  		;push	ds ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6800 00001FF6 1E                      		push	ds

  6818                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6819                                  		;pop	ds ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6820                                  
  6821                                  ; at this point, in bpb of bds table, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS which is
  6822                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6823                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6824                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6825                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.
  6826                                  ; we don't do this for the bpb information from the boot record. we
  6827                                  ; are not going to change the bpb information from the boot record.
  6828                                  
  6829                                  massage_bpb:
  6830                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6831                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  6832                                  		;
  6833                                  		;; 12/12/2022

  6952                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  6953                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  6954                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  6955                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.

  6975 00002089 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6976

  6982                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.

  7147                                  
  7148                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7149                                  ;
  7150                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7151                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7152                                  ;
  7153                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7154                                  ;
  7155                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7156                                  ;   initialize it.
  7157                                  ;
  7158                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7159                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7160                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7161                                  ;
  7162                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7163                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7164                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7165                                  ;
  7166                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7167                                  ;   save coding.
  7168                                  ;
  7169                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7170                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7171                                  ;
  7172                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7173                                  ;
  7174                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7175                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7176                                  ;
  7177                                  ; called modules:
  7178                                  ;		  getboot
  7179                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7180                                  ;
  7181                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7182                                  ;
  7183                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7184                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7185                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7186                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7187                                  ;
  7188                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7189                                  
  7190                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7191                                  domini:	
  7192 00002134 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7193                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7194 00002138 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7195                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7196 0000213A 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7197 0000213C B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7198                                  domini_loop:				
  7199 0000213E 52                      		push	dx
  7200 0000213F 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7201 00002143 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7202 00002145 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7203                                  					; DL = drive number
  7204                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7205                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7206                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7207 00002147 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7208 00002149 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7209 0000214B 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7210 0000214D A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7211 00002150 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7212 00002153 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7213 00002155 A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7214 00002158 06                      		push	es
  7215 00002159 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7216 0000215D E87BFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7217                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7218 00002160 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7219 00002162 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7220                                  domininext:				
  7221 00002165 07                      		pop	es
  7222 00002166 5A                      		pop	dx
  7223 00002167 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7224 00002169 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7225 0000216B 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7226                                  dominiret:				
  7227 0000216D C3                      		retn
  7228                                  
  7229                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7230                                  
  7231                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7232                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7233                                  
  7234                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7235                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7236                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7237                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7238                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7239                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7240                                  ;
  7241                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7242                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7243                                  
  7244                                  
  7245                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7246 0000216E 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7247                                  fmpnext:				
  7248 00002172 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7249 00002176 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7250 00002178 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7251 0000217B 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7252 0000217F 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7253                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7254                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7255                                  fmpnextfound:
  7256 00002181 C3                      		retn
  7257                                  
  7258                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7259                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7260                                  ;fmpret:
  7261                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7262                                  
  7263                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7264                                  
  7265                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7266                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7267 00002182 E89D00                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7268 00002185 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7269 00002187 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7270 0000218B C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7271                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7272 00002190 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7273                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7274                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7275 00002194 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7276                                  					; ffHardFile
  7277 00002198 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7278 0000219D A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7279 000021A0 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7280 000021A3 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7281 000021A6 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7282 000021A9 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7283 000021AC 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7284                                  					; set physical number
  7285 000021AF A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7286 000021B2 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7287                                  					; set logical number
  7288 000021B5 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7289 000021BA 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7290 000021BC 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7291                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7292 000021C1 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7293                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7294                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7295 000021C3 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7296 000021C6 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7297 000021CA 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7298 000021CD D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7299 000021CF D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7300 000021D1 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7301 000021D5 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7302                                  					; set hidden trks
  7303 000021D8 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7304 000021DC 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7305 000021E0 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7306 000021E4 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7307 000021E7 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7308 000021EA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7309                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7310                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7311                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7312 000021EC 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7313 000021EE BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7314                                  
  7315                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7316                                  		;push	es
  7317 000021F1 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7318                                  					; bx value saved.
  7319                                  		;pop	es  ; 14/08/2023
  7320 000021F4 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7321 000021F6 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7322                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7323 000021F9 E976FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7324                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7326                                  
  7327                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7328                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7329                                  		;retn

  7336                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7337                                  	
  7338 000021FC 57                      		push	di
  7339 000021FD 53                      		push	bx

  7342                                  		;push	ds
  7343 000021FE 06                      		push	es
  7344                                  setmini_1:

  7346 00002203 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7348 00002209 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7350 0000220F 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7352 00002214 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7353 00002218 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7354 0000221A F9                      		stc
  7355 0000221B 07                      		pop	es
  7356                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7357                                  		;pop	ds

  7371                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7372                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7373                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7374                                  ;
  7375                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7376                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7377                                  ;			trash ax
  7378                                  
  7379                                  dmax_check:	
  7380 00002222 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7381 00002227 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7382 00002229 06                      		push	es
  7383                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7384 0000222A B85004                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7385 0000222D 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7386                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7387 0000222F 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7388                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7389                                  					; set message flag
  7390                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7391 00002235 07                      		pop	es
  7392                                  
  7393                                  		;;push	es
  7394                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7395                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7396                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7397                                  					; set message flag
  7398                                  		;;pop	es
  7399                                  		;
  7400                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7401                                  dmax_ok:				
  7402 00002236 C3                      		retn
  7403                                  
  7404                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7405                                  
  7406                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7407                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7408                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7409                                  ;								 
  7410                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7411                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7412                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7413                                  
  7414                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7415 00002237 56                      		push	si
  7416 00002238 53                      		push	bx
  7417 00002239 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7418                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7419 0000223D 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7420 00002240 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7421                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7422 00002242 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7423 00002244 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7424                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7425                                  
  7426                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7427                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7428 00002246 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7429                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7430 00002248 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7431                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7432 0000224B C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7433                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7434 0000224F 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7435                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7436                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7437 00002252 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7438 00002255 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7439 00002259 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7440 0000225B 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7441 00002260 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7442 00002264 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7443 00002269 5B                      		pop	bx
  7444 0000226A 5E                      		pop	si
  7445 0000226B C3                      		retn
  7446                                  
  7447                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7448                                  
  7449                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7450                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7451                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7452                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7453                                  
  7454                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7455 0000226C 50                      		push	ax
  7456 0000226D 51                      		push	cx
  7457 0000226E 52                      		push	dx
  7458 0000226F 55                      		push	bp
  7459 00002270 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7460                                  loop_clock:				
  7461 00002272 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7462 00002274 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7463 00002276 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7464 00002278 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7465                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7466                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7467                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7468 0000227A 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7469 0000227D 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7470 0000227F 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7471 00002282 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7472 00002284 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7473 00002287 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7474 00002289 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7475 0000228A B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7476                                  delay:					
  7477 0000228D E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7478 0000228F EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7480                                  
  7481                                  clock_present:				
  7482 00002291 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7483 00002297 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7484                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7485                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7486 0000229A 56                      		push	si
  7487 0000229B E88BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7488 0000229E FA                      		cli
  7489                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7490 0000229F 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7491 000022A3 FB                      		sti
  7492 000022A4 5E                      		pop	si
  7493                                  
  7494                                  no_readdate:				
  7495 000022A5 5D                      		pop	bp
  7496 000022A6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7497 000022A7 59                      		pop	cx
  7498 000022A8 58                      		pop	ax
  7499 000022A9 C3                      		retn
  7500                                  
  7501                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7502                                  
  7503                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7504                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7505                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7506                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7507                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7508                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7509                                  ;
  7510                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7511                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7512                                  ;
  7513                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7514                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7515                                  ;
  7516                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7517                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7518                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7519                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7520                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7521                                  ;
  7522                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7523                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7524                                  
  7525                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7526                                  
  7527                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7528                                  
  7529                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7530                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7531                                  			
  7532 000022AA 50                      		push	ax
  7533 000022AB 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7534 000022B1 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7535 000022B3 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7536                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7537 000022B9 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7538 000022BB 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7539                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7540 000022C1 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7541                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7542                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7543                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7544                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7545                                  cmosck4:				
  7546 000022C3 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7547                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7548 000022C5 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7549                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7550 000022C7 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7551 000022CA B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7552                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7553 000022CC E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7554 000022CF 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7555                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7556 000022D1 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7557 000022D3 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7558                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7559 000022D5 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7560                                  cmosck9:				
  7561 000022D8 58                      		pop	ax
  7562 000022D9 C3                      		retn
  7563                                  
  7564                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7565                                  
  7566                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7567                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7568                                  ;									       :
  7569                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7570                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7571                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7572                                  ;									       :
  7573                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7574                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7575                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7576                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7577                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7578                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7579                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7580                                  
  7581                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7582 000022DA 9C                      		pushf
  7583 000022DB FA                      		cli
  7584 000022DC 53                      		push	bx
  7585 000022DD 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7586 000022DE 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7587 000022E0 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7588                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7589 000022E2 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7590 000022E3 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7591 000022E5 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7592 000022E7 58                      		pop	ax
  7593 000022E8 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7594 000022EA 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7595 000022EC E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7596                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7597 000022EE 90                      		nop
  7598 000022EF E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7599 000022F1 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7600 000022F3 5B                      		pop	bx
  7601 000022F4 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7602 000022F5 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7603 000022F8 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7604                                  
  7605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7606                                  
  7607                                  cmos_popf:				
  7608 000022F9 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7609                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7610                                  
  7611                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7612                                  
  7613                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7614                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7615                                  ;									       :
  7616                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7617                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7618                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7619                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7620                                  ;									       :
  7621                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7622                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7623                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7624                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7625                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7626                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7627                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7628                                  
  7629                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7630 000022FA 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7631 000022FB 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7632 000022FC FA                      		cli
  7633 000022FD 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7634 000022FE 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7635 00002300 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7636                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7637 00002302 90                      		nop
  7638 00002303 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7639 00002305 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7640 00002307 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7641 00002308 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7642 0000230A 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7643 0000230C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7644                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7645 0000230E 90                      		nop
  7646 0000230F E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7647 00002311 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7648 00002312 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7649 00002313 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7650 00002316 C3                      		retn
  7651                                  
  7652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7653                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7655                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7657                                  
  7658                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7659                                  ;
  7660                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7661                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7662                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7663                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7664                                  
  7665                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7666                                  
  7667                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7668                                  ;
  7669                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7670                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7671                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7672                                  
  7673                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7674                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7675                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7676                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7677                                  
  7678                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7679                                  getclus:				
  7680 00002317 51                      		push	cx
  7681 00002318 57                      		push	di
  7682 00002319 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7683 0000231E 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7684 00002320 48                      		dec	ax
  7685 00002321 48                      		dec	ax
  7686 00002322 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7687                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7688                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7689 00002324 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7690 00002329 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7691                                  unpack:					
  7692 0000232E 1E                      		push	ds
  7693 0000232F 50                      		push	ax
  7694 00002330 53                      		push	bx
  7695 00002331 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7696 00002336 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7697 00002338 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7698 0000233A 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7699                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7700 00002340 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7701 00002342 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7702                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7703 00002344 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7704                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7705 00002346 52                      		push	dx
  7706 00002347 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7707 00002349 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7708 0000234C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7709 0000234D 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7710 0000234F 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7711                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7712                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7713 00002351 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7714 00002355 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7715 00002356 52                      		push	dx
  7716 00002357 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7717 00002359 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7718 0000235C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7719                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7720 0000235D A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7721 00002360 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7722 00002364 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7723                                  even_odd:				
  7724 00002368 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7725 00002369 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7726 0000236A D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7727 0000236C 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7728 0000236E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7729                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7730 00002370 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7731 00002372 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7732 00002374 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7733                                  havclus:				
  7734 00002376 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7735 00002378 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7736 0000237C EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7738                                  
  7739                                  unpack16:				
  7740 0000237E 52                      		push	dx
  7741 0000237F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7742 00002381 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7743 00002383 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7744 00002386 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7745 00002389 5A                      		pop	dx
  7746 0000238A 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7747                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7748                                  unpackx:				
  7749 0000238C 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7750 0000238D 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7751 0000238E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7752 0000238F 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7753 00002391 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7754 00002394 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7755 00002396 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7756 0000239B EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7757                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7758                                  
  7759                                  getcl2:					
  7760 0000239D 53                      		push	bx
  7761 0000239E 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7762 0000239F 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7763 000023A0 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7764 000023A4 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7765 000023A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7766 000023AA 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7767                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7768 000023AF 1E                      		push	ds
  7769 000023B0 0E                      		push	cs
  7770 000023B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7771 000023B2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7772                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7773 000023B3 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7774                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7775                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7776 000023B6 E8ACF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7777 000023B9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7778 000023BA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7779 000023BB 5F                      		pop	di
  7780 000023BC 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7781 000023C0 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7782 000023C2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7783 000023C4 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7784 000023C6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7785 000023C7 C3                      		retn
  7786                                  
  7787                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7788                                  
  7789                                  
  7790                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7791                                  ;
  7792                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7793                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7794                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7795                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7796                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7797                                  ;
  7798                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7799                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7800                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7801                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7802                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7803                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7804                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7805                                  
  7806                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7807                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7808 000023C8 50                      		push	ax
  7809 000023C9 51                      		push	cx
  7810 000023CA 57                      		push	di
  7811 000023CB 56                      		push	si
  7812 000023CC 06                      		push	es
  7813 000023CD 1E                      		push	ds
  7814 000023CE 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7815 000023D0 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7816 000023D5 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7817 000023D7 90                      		nop
  7818                                  
  7819                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7820                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7821                                  
  7822 000023D8 06                      		push	es
  7823 000023D9 1E                      		push	ds
  7824 000023DA 57                      		push	di
  7825 000023DB 50                      		push	ax
  7826 000023DC 0E                      		push	cs
  7827 000023DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  7828                                  
  7829 000023DE 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7830 000023E2 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7831                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7832                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7833 000023E5 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7834 000023E6 E87CF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7835 000023E9 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7836 000023EA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7837                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7838 000023EE 5F                      		pop	di
  7839 000023EF 1F                      		pop	ds
  7840 000023F0 07                      		pop	es
  7841 000023F1 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7842 000023F6 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7843 000023F8 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7844                                  					; sector number
  7845                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7846 000023FC 52                      		push	dx
  7847 000023FD 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7848                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7849                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7850 00002404 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7851 00002406 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7852 00002409 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7853 0000240D 1E                      		push	ds
  7854 0000240E 07                      		pop	es
  7855 0000240F 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7856 00002411 1E                      		push	ds
  7857 00002412 0E                      		push	cs
  7858 00002413 1F                      		pop	ds
  7859 00002414 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7860 00002415 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7861                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7862                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7863 00002418 E84AF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7864 0000241B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7865 0000241C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7866 0000241D 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7867                                  
  7868                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7869 00002422 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7870 00002423 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7871                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7872                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7873 00002425 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7874 00002427 1F                      		pop	ds
  7875 00002428 07                      		pop	es
  7876 00002429 5E                      		pop	si
  7877 0000242A 5F                      		pop	di
  7878 0000242B 59                      		pop	cx
  7879 0000242C 58                      		pop	ax
  7880 0000242D C3                      		retn
  7881                                  
  7882                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7883                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
