  7884                                  
  7885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7886                                  
  7887                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7888                                  		;db 0
  7889                                  
  7890                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7891                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7892                                  
  7893                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7894 0000242E 00<rep 2h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7895                                  %endif
  7896                                  
  7897                                  ;align 16
  7898                                  
  7899                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7900                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7901                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7902                                  
  7903                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7905                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7906                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7907                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7909                                  
  7910                                  ;============================================================================
  7911                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7912                                  ;============================================================================
  7913                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7914                                  
  7915                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7916                                  
  7917                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7918                                   
  7919                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7920                                  
  7921                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7923                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7925                                  
  7926                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7927 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7928 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7929                                  
  7930                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7931                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7932                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7933                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7934                                  
  7935                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7936                                  
  7937                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7938                                  
  7939                                  ;************************************************************************
  7940                                  ;*									*
  7941                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7942                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7943                                  ;*									*
  7944                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7945                                  ;*									*
  7946                                  ;************************************************************************
  7947                                  
  7948                                  _seg_reinit:
  7949 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7950                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7951                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7952 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7953 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7954                                  
  7955                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7956 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7957 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7958 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7959 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7960 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7961                                  
  7962                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7963                                  
  7964                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7965                                  
  7966                                  ;************************************************************************
  7967                                  ;*									*
  7968                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7969                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7970                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7971                                  ;*									*
  7972                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7973                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7974                                  ;*									*
  7975                                  ;************************************************************************
  7976                                  
  7977                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7978 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7979 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7980 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7981 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7982 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7983 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7984 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7985 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7986 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7987 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7988 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7989                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7990                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7991 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7992 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7993 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7994 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7995 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7996 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7997 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7998 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7999 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8000 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8001                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8002 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8003                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8004                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8005 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8006                                  
  8007                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8008                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8009                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8010                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8011                                  ;
  8012                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8013                                  ;
  8014                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8015                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8016                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8017                                  ;
  8018                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8019                                  
  8020                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8021 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8022 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8023 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8024 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8025                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8026                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8027 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8028 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8029                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8030                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8031 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8032 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8033 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8034 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8035 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8036 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8037 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8038 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8039 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8040 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8041                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8042 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8043                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8044 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8045 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8046                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8047                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8048                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8049                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8050 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8051                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8052 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8053 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8054                                  					; mark operation complete
  8055 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8056 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8057 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8058 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8059 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8060 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8061 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8062 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8063 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8064 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8065                                  	
  8066                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8067                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8068                                  bc_retf:
  8069 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8071                                  
  8072                                  command_error:				
  8073 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8074 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8075                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8076                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8077                                  
  8078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8079                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8080                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8081                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8082                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8083                                  ; high.
  8084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8085                                  
  8086                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8087                                  
  8088                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8089                                  
  8090 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8091                                  
  8092 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8093                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8094                                  		
  8095                                  
  8096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8097                                  
  8098                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8099                                  
  8100                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8101 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8102                                  					; unknown command error
  8103                                  
  8104                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8105                                  
  8106                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8107                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8108                                  
  8109                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8110                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8111                                  
  8112                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8113                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8114                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8115 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8116 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8117                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8118 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8119 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8120 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8121                                  
  8122                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8123                                  
  8124                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8125                                  
  8126                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8127                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8129                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8130                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8131                                  
  8132                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8133                                  
  8134                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8135                                  
  8136                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8137                                  
  8138                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8139                                  
  8140                                  ;************************************************************************
  8141                                  ;*									*
  8142                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8143                                  ;*									*
  8144                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8145                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8146                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8147                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8148                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8149                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8150                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8151                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8152                                  ;*									*
  8153                                  ;************************************************************************
  8154                                  
  8155                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8156                                  		;db 0
  8157                                  
  8158                                  		; 13/12/202
  8159 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8160                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8161 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8162                                  					; 00 init
  8163 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8164 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8165 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8166                                  					; 03
  8167 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8168                                  					; 04
  8169 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8170                                  					; 05
  8171 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8172 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8173                                  					; 07
  8174 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8175                                  					; 08
  8176 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8177 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8178                                  con_table_end:
  8179 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8180                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8181 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8182 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8183 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8184 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8185 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8186                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8187 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8188                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8189 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8190 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8191 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8192 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8193 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8194 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8195 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8196 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8197 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8198 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8199 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8200 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8201 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8202 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8203 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8204 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8205 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8206 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8207 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8208 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8209                                  prn_table_end:
  8210 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8211                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8212 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8213 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8214 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8215 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8216 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8217 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8218 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8219 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8220 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8221 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8222 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8223                                  aux_table_end:
  8224 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8225                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8226 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8227 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8228 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8229 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8230 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8231 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8232 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8233 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8234 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8235 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8236                                  tim_table_end:
  8237                                  
  8238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8239                                  
  8240                                  ;************************************************************************
  8241                                  ;*									*
  8242                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8243                                  ;*									*
  8244                                  ;************************************************************************
  8245                                  
  8246                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8247                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8248 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8249                                  con_loop:				
  8250 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8251 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8252 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8253                                  con_exit:				
  8254 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8255 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8256                                  
  8257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8258                                  
  8259                                  ;************************************************************************
  8260                                  ;*									*
  8261                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8262                                  ;*									*
  8263                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8264                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8265                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8266                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8267                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8268                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8269                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8270                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8271                                  ;*									*
  8272                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8273                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8274                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8275                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8276                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8277                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8278                                  ;*									*
  8279                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8280                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8281                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;************************************************************************
  8284                                  
  8285                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8286                                  chrin:		
  8287 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8288 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8289 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8290 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8291 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8292 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8293 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8294 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8295 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8296 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8297 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8298 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8299                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8300                                  
  8301                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8302                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8303                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8304                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8305                                  ;      else
  8306                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8307                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8308                                  ;      endif
  8309                                  ;    endif
  8310                                  ;  endif
  8311                                  
  8312                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8313 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8314 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8315 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8316 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8317 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8318 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8319 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8320 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8322                                  
  8323                                  not_ext:				
  8324 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8325 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8326                                  alt_save:				
  8327 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8328                                  keyret:					
  8329 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8330                                  
  8331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8332                                  
  8333                                  ;************************************************************************
  8334                                  ;*									*
  8335                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8336                                  ;*									*
  8337                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8338                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8339                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8340                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8341                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8342                                  ;*									*
  8343                                  ;************************************************************************
  8344                                  
  8345                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8346                                  con_rdnd:				
  8347 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8348 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8349 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8350 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8351 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8352 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8353 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8354 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8355 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8356                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8357 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8358                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8359 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8360 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8361 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8362 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8363                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8364                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8365                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8366                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8367 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8368 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8369 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8371                                  
  8372                                  gotchr:					
  8373 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8374 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8375 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8376 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8377 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8378                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8379                                  
  8380                                  notbrk:					
  8381 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8382 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8383 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8384 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8385                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8386                                  
  8387                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8388 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8389 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8390 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8391 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8392 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8393 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8394 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8395                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8396                                  rdexit:					
  8397 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8398 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8399                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8400                                  bc_exvec:				
  8401 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8402                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8403 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8405                                  
  8406                                  ;************************************************************************
  8407                                  ;*									*
  8408                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8409                                  ;*									*
  8410                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8411                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8412                                  ;*									*
  8413                                  ;************************************************************************
  8414                                  
  8415                                  con_writ:
  8416                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8417 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8418                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8419                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8420                                  con_lp:					
  8421 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8422 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8423 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8424                                  					; AL = character to display
  8425 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8426                                  cc_ret:					
  8427 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8428 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8429                                  
  8430                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8431                                  
  8432                                  ;************************************************************************
  8433                                  ;*									*
  8434                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8435                                  ;*									*
  8436                                  ;************************************************************************
  8437                                  
  8438                                  con_flush:
  8439 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8440                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8441 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8442 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8443                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8444                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8445                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8446 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8447 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8448 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8449                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8450 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8451                                  
  8452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8453                                  
  8454                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8455                                  
  8456                                  ;************************************************************************
  8457                                  ;*									*
  8458                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8459                                  ;*									*
  8460                                  ;************************************************************************
  8461                                  
  8462                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8463                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8464                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8465                                  
  8466                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8467                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8468                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8469                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8470                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8471                                  ;
  8472                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8473                                  
  8474                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8475                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8476                                  
  8477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8478                                  
  8479                                  ;************************************************************************
  8480                                  ;*									*
  8481                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8482                                  ;*									*
  8483                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8484                                  ;*									*
  8485                                  ;************************************************************************
  8486                                  
  8487                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8488 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8489                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8490                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8491                                  prn_done:
  8492 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8493 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8495                                  
  8496                                  ;************************************************************************
  8497                                  ;*									*
  8498                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8499                                  ;*									*
  8500                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8501                                  ;*									*
  8502                                  ;************************************************************************
  8503                                  
  8504                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8505                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8506 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8507                                  prn_loop:				
  8508 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8509                                  prn_out:				
  8510 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8511 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8512 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8513 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8514 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8515 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8516 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8517 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8518 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8519 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8520 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8522                                  
  8523                                  _prnwf:					
  8524 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8525 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8526                                  TestPrnError:				
  8527 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8528 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8529                                  pmessg:					
  8530 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8532                                  
  8533                                  prn_con:				
  8534 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8535 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8536                                  ;prn_done:				
  8537                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8538                                  prn_done2:
  8539                                  		;clc
  8540                                  		; cf=0
  8541 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8543                                  
  8544                                  ;************************************************************************
  8545                                  ;*									*
  8546                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8547                                  ;*									*
  8548                                  ;************************************************************************
  8549                                  
  8550                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8551 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8552 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8553 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8554                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8555                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8556 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8557 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8559                                  
  8560                                  ;************************************************************************
  8561                                  ;*									*
  8562                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8563                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8564                                  ;*									*
  8565                                  ;************************************************************************
  8566                                  
  8567                                  prnstat:				
  8568 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8569                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8570                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8571                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8572                                  
  8573                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8574                                  
  8575                                  ;************************************************************************
  8576                                  ;*									*
  8577                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8578                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8579                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8580                                  ;*									*
  8581                                  ;************************************************************************
  8582                                  
  8583                                  prnop:	
  8584 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8585 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8586                                  
  8587                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8588                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8589                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8590                                  
  8591 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8592 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8593 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8594 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8595 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8596 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8597 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8598                                  
  8599                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8600                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8601                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8602                                  
  8603                                  NextTest:				
  8604 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8605                                  					; i/o error?
  8606 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8607                                  
  8608                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8609                                  
  8610 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8611                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8612 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8613 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8614 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8615                                  ret1:					
  8616 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8618                                  
  8619                                  checknotready:				
  8620 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8621 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8622 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8623                                  
  8624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8625                                  
  8626                                  ;************************************************************************
  8627                                  ;*									*
  8628                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8629                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8630                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8631                                  ;*									*
  8632                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8633                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8634                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8635                                  ;*									*
  8636                                  ;************************************************************************
  8637                                  
  8638                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8639                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8640 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8641                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8642 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8643 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8644 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8645 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8646 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8647                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8648 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8649 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8650                                  prn_getstat:				
  8651 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8652 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8653 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8654 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8655 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8656 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8657 000002A6 26                      		es
  8658 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8659                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8660                                  					; lodsb
  8661 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8662 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8663 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8664 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8665                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8666                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8667                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8668 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8669                                  
  8670                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8671                                  
  8672                                  prn_bperr:				
  8673 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8674                                  prn_berr:				
  8675 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8677                                  
  8678                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8679                                  
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8683                                  ;*									*
  8684                                  ;************************************************************************
  8685                                  
  8686                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8687                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8688                                  
  8689                                  ;********************************;*
  8690                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8691                                  ;********************************;*
  8692                                  
  8693                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8694                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8695                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8696                                  
  8697                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8698                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8699                                  ;;endstruc
  8700                                  
  8701                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8702                                  
  8703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8704                                  
  8705                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8706                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8707 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8708 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8709                                  					; ioc_pc
  8710 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8711                                  
  8712                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8713 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8715                                  
  8716                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8717 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8718 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8719 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8720                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8721 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8722 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8723                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8724 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8725 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8726 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8727 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8728 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8729 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8730                                  prngetcount:				
  8731                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8732 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8733 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8734                                  					; return current retry count
  8735                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8736                                  		; cf=0
  8737                                  		;clc
  8738 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8740                                  
  8741                                  ;************************************************************************
  8742                                  ;*									*
  8743                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8744                                  ;*									*
  8745                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8746                                  ;************************************************************************
  8747                                  
  8748                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8749 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8750 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8751                                  					; ioc_pc
  8752 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8753 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8754 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8755 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8756 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8757 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8758                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8759                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8760                                  		; cf=0		
  8761                                  		;clc
  8762 00000302 C3                      		retn
  8763                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8764                                  
  8765                                  prn_query_err:
  8766                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8767                                  		;stc
  8768 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8770                                  
  8771                                  ;************************************************************************
  8772                                  ;*									*
  8773                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8774                                  ;*									*
  8775                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8776                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8777                                  ;*									*
  8778                                  ;************************************************************************
  8779                                  
  8780                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8781                                  
  8782                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8783                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8784                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8785                                  
  8786                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8787                                  
  8788                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8789                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8790                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8791                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8792                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8793                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8794                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8795                                  
  8796                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8797                                  
  8798                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8799                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8800                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ;************************************************************************
  8805                                  ;*									*
  8806                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8807                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8808                                  ;*									*
  8809                                  ;************************************************************************
  8810                                  
  8811                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8812                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8813 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8814 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8815 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8816 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8817 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8818 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8819                                  aux1:					
  8820 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8821                                  					; won't return if error
  8822                                  aux2:					
  8823 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8824 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8825                                  exvec2:					
  8826 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8827                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8828 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ;************************************************************************
  8832                                  ;*									*
  8833                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8834                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8835                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8836                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8837                                  ;*									*
  8838                                  ;************************************************************************
  8839                                  
  8840                                  auxin:					
  8841 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8842 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8843 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8844                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8845                                  		;retn
  8846                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8847 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8849                                  
  8850                                  arbad:					
  8851 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8852 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8853 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8854 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8857                                  
  8858                                  ;************************************************************************
  8859                                  ;*									*
  8860                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8861                                  ;*									*
  8862                                  ;************************************************************************
  8863                                  
  8864                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8865 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8866 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8867 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8868 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8869 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8870 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8871 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8872 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8873 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8874 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8875 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8876                                  auxdrx:					
  8877 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8879                                  
  8880                                  auxbus:					
  8881 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8883                                  
  8884                                  ;************************************************************************
  8885                                  ;*									*
  8886                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8887                                  ;*									*
  8888                                  ;************************************************************************
  8889                                  
  8890                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8891 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8892 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8893 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8894 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8895 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8896                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8897                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8898                                  		;clc
  8899 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8900                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8901                                  
  8902                                  ;************************************************************************
  8903                                  ;*									*
  8904                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8905                                  ;*									*
  8906                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8907                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8908                                  ;*									*
  8909                                  ;************************************************************************
  8910                                  
  8911                                  auxstat:				
  8912 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8913                                  
  8914                                  		; fall into auxop
  8915                                  
  8916                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8917                                  
  8918                                  ;************************************************************************
  8919                                  ;*									*
  8920                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8921                                  ;*									*
  8922                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8923                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8924                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8925                                  ;*									*
  8926                                  ;************************************************************************
  8927                                  
  8928                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8929 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8930                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8931                                  					; get port number
  8932 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8933                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8934                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8935 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8936                                  
  8937                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8938                                  
  8939                                  ;************************************************************************
  8940                                  ;*									*
  8941                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8942                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8943                                  ;*									*
  8944                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8945                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8946                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8947                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8948                                  ;*									*
  8949                                  ;************************************************************************
  8950                                  
  8951                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8952 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8953 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8954                                  					; zero out buffer
  8955                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8956                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8957                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8958 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8960                                  
  8961                                  ;************************************************************************
  8962                                  ;*									*
  8963                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8964                                  ;*									*
  8965                                  ;************************************************************************
  8966                                  
  8967                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8968                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8969 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8970                                  aux_loop:				
  8971 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8972                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8973 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8974 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8975 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8976 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8977 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8978 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8979 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8981                                  
  8982                                  awok:					
  8983 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8984                                  					; still	more character to print
  8985                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8986                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8987                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8988 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8989                                  
  8990                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8991                                  
  8992                                  ;************************************************************************
  8993                                  ;*									*
  8994                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8995                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8996                                  ;*									*
  8997                                  ;************************************************************************
  8998                                  
  8999                                  getbx:	
  9000 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9001                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
