 11042 00000AF8 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11043 00000AFA 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11044 00000AFE 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11045 00000B00 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11046 00000B02 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11047                                  noxor:					
 11048 00000B06 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11049                                  disk_ret:				
 11050 00000B0A F8                      		clc
 11051 00000B0B C3                      		retn
 11052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11053                                  
 11054                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11055                                  
 11056                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11057                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11058                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11059                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11060                                  
 11061                                  do_write:				
 11062 00000B0C 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11063 00000B10 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11064 00000B12 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11065 00000B16 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11066                                  
 11067                                  do_norm:				
 11068 00000B18 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11069 00000B1B EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11071                                  
 11072                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11073                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11074                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11075                                  
 11076                                  doverify:				
 11077 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11078 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11079 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11080 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11081 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11082                                  
 11083                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11084                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11085                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11086                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11087                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11088                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11089                                  
 11090 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11091 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11092 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11093 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11094 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11095 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11097                                  
 11098                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11099 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11100 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11101 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11103                                  
 11104                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11105                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11106                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11107                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11108                                  
 11109                                  dskerr:					
 11110 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11111 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11112 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11113                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11114 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11115 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11116 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11117 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11118                                  dochkagain:				
 11119 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11120                                  dskerr0:				
 11121 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11122 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11123                                  					; fnon_removable
 11124 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11125 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11126 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11127                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11128 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11129 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11130 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11131                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11132                                  dskerr1:				
 11133 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11134                                  		;jmp	retry
 11135                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11136 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11137                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11138                                  
 11139                                  write_fault_err:			
 11140 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11141                                  					; for write fault error.
 11142 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11143                                  
 11144                                  		; fall into harderr
 11145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11146                                  
 11147                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11148                                  
 11149                                  harderr:				
 11150 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11151                                  harderr2:				
 11152 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11153                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11154 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11155 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11156                                  
 11157                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11158                                  
 11159                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11160                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11161 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11162                                  
 11163                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11164                                  
 11165                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11166                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11167                                  
 11168                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11169                                  normspeed:
 11170 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11171 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11172 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11173 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11174 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11175 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11176 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11177 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11178 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11179 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11180 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11181 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11182 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11183                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11184 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11185 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11186                                  
 11187                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11188                                  
 11189                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11190                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11191                                  
 11192                                  fastspeed:		
 11193 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11194                                  					; ftoobig
 11195 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11196 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11197 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11198 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11199 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11200 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11201 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11202                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11203                                  
 11204                                  notready:				
 11205 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11206 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11207 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11208                                  
 11209                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11210                                  
 11211                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11212                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11213                                  
 11214                                  maperror:	
 11215 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11216 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11217 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11218 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11219 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11220 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11221 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11222                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11223 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11224 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11225                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11226 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11227                                  					; get translation
 11228                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11229                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11230 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11231 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11232 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11233 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11234                                  
 11235                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11236                                  
 11237                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11238                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11239                                  
 11240                                  set_tim:		
 11241 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11242 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11243                                  
 11244                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11245                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11246                                  
 11247 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11248 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11249 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11250                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11251                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11252 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11253                                  setaccess:				
 11254 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11255 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11256 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11257                                  done_set:				
 11258 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11259                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11260 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11261 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11262                                  
 11263                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11264                                  
 11265                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11266                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11267                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11268                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11269                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11270                                  
 11271                                  again:	
 11272 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11273 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11274 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11275                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11276 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11277 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11279                                  
 11280                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11281 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11282 00000C11 C3                      		retn

 11295                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11296                                  ;
 11297                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11298                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11299                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11300                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11301                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11302                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11303                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11304                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11305                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11306                                  
 11307                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11308                                  
 11309                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11310                                  
 11311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11312 00000C12 00                      		db 0
 11313                                  
 11314                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11315                                  %if 0
 11316                                  
 11317                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11318                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11319                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11320                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11321                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11322                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11323                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11324                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11325                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11326                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11327                                  
 11328                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11329                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11330                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11331                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11332                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11333                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11334                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11335                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11336                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11337                                  
 11338                                  %endif

 11341 00000C13 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11342 00000C14 [7E0C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11343 00000C16 [C00E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11344 00000C18 [600E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11345 00000C1A [7A0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11346 00000C1C [7A0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11347 00000C1E [7A0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11348 00000C20 [4A11]                  		dw GetMediaId		; 66h

 11356 00000C2D [7A0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 11364                                  ;
 11365                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for

 11388                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11389                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11390                                  ;
 11391                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11392                                  ;
 11393                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11394                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11395                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11396                                  ;
 11397                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11398                                  
 11399                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11400                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11401                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11402 00000C42 E886F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11403 00000C45 06                      		push	es
 11404 00000C46 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11405 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11406                                  					; RAWIO
 11407 00000C4F 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11408 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 11409 00000C54 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11410                                  
 11411                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11412                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11413                                  
 11414                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11415 00000C56 BE[130C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11416                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11417                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11418 00000C59 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11419 00000C5B 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11420                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11421 00000C5D BE[260C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11422                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11423                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11424                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11425 00000C60 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11426 00000C62 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11427 00000C64 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11428 00000C67 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11429 00000C69 98                      		cbw
 11430 00000C6A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11431 00000C6C 46                      		inc	si
 11432 00000C6D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11433 00000C6F 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11434                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11435 00000C72 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11436                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11437                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11438 00000C77 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11439 00000C79 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11441                                  
 11442                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11443                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11444                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11445 00000C7A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11446                                  
 11447                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11448 00000C7B E957F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11450                                  
 11451                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11452                                  
 11453                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11454                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11455                                  ;
 11456                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11457                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11458                                  ;
 11459                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11460                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11461                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11462                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11463                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11464                                  
 11465                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11466                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11467                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11468                                  
 11469 00000C7E C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11470 00000C82 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11471                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11472 00000C85 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11473 00000C89 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11474 00000C8C 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11475 00000C90 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11476                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11477 00000C93 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11478 00000C96 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]

 11686                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11687                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11688                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11689                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11690                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11691                                  ;
 11692                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11693                                  ;
 11694                                  ; output:
 11695                                  ;	for status call:
 11696                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11697                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11698                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11699                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11700                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11701                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11702                                  ;
 11703                                  ;	for format track:
 11704                                  ;		carry set if error
 11705                                  ;
 11706                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11707                                  
 11708                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11709                                  
 11710                                  		; 19/10/2022

 11848

 11858 00000E80 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11859                                  
 11860                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11861                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11862                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11863                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11864                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11865                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11866                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11867                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11868                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11869                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11870                                  		; register.
 11871                                  
 11872                                  					; Special function requested?

 11975                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 11977                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11978                                  ;
 11979                                  ; TrackIo:
 11980                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11981                                  ;
 11982                                  ;   input:
 11983                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11984                                  ;		  3 = write
 11985                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11986                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11987                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11988                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11989                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11990                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11991                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11992                                  ;
 11993                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11994

 12224                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 12230                                  
 12231                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12232                                  
 12233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12234                                  ;
 12235                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12236                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12237                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12238                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12239                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12240                                  ;
 12241                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12242                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12243                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12244                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12245                                  ;
 12246                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12247                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12248                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12249                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12250                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12251                                  ;
 12252                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12253                                  
 12254                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12255                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12256 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12257 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12258                                  
 12259                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12260                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12261                                  
 12262 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12263 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12264 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12265 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12266 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12267 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12269                                  
 12270                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:

 12273                                  
 12274                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12275                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 12277 00000FEF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12278                                  
 12279 00000FF1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12280                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12281                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12282 00000FF6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 12306                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track

 12391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12392                                  ;
 12393                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12394                                  ;
 12395                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12396                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12397                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12398                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12399                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12409                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12410                                  					; Reset while formatting?

 12413                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12414 00001075 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12415                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 12417                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12418 00001078 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12419                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12420 0000107A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12421                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12422 0000107F 58                      		pop	ax

 12429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12430                                  ;
 12431                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12432                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12433                                  ;
 12434                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12435                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12436                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12437                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12438                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12439                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12440                                  ;
 12441                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12442                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12443                                  ;
 12444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12445                                  
 12446                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12447                                  ToRom:	
 12448 00001081 53                      		push	bx
 12449 00001082 56                      		push	si
 12450

 12452                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12453                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]

 12474                                  					; Important for	format

 12479 000010B7 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK

 12481                                  MotorStrtOK:

 12483 000010BF 58                      		pop	ax

 12493 000010D6 5E                      		pop	si
 12494 000010D7 5B                      		pop	bx

 12499                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12500                                  
 12501                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12502                                  
 12503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12504                                  ;
 12505                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12506                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12507                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12508                                  ;
 12509                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12510                                  
 12511                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12512                                  ioctl_getown:
 12513 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12514 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12515                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12516 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12517                                  ownloop:				
 12518 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12519 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12520                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12521 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12522                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12523                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12524 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12525                                  getnextBDS:				
 12526 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12527 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12529                                  
 12530                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12531                                  ;
 12532                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12533                                  ; in al to al.
 12534                                  ;
 12535                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12536                                  
 12537                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12538                                  ioctl_setown:
 12539 000010F6 E8D2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12540 000010F9 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12541                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12542 000010FE E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12543                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12544 00001101 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12545                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12546                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12547                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12548                                  
 12549                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12550                                  ;
 12551                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12552                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12553                                  ;
 12554                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12555                                  
 12556                                  exitown:				
 12557 00001105 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12558                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12559 00001107 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12560                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12561                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12562 0000110C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12563 0000110E 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12564                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12565                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12566 00001112 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12567                                  exitnomult:				
 12568 00001114 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12569 00001118 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12570                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12571                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12572                                  		; cf=0
 12573                                  		;clc
 12574 0000111B C3                      		retn

 12624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12625                                  
 12626                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12627                                  
 12628                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12629                                  ;	get media id
 12630                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12631                                  ;
 12632                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12633                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12634                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12635                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12636                                  ;
 12637                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12638                                  ;
 12639                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12640                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12641                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12642                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12645                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12646                                  ;
 12647                                  ; LOGIC:
 12648                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12649                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12650                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12651                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12652                                  ;
 12653                                  ; {
 12654                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12655                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12656                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12657                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12658                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12659                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12660                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12661                                  ;		};
 12662                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12663                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12664                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12665                                  ;		};
 12666                                  ;	else
 12667                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12668                                  ;
 12669                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12670                                  
 12671                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12672                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12673                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12674                                  
 12675                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12676                                  GetMediaId:
 12677 0000114A E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12678 0000114D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12679 00001151 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12680 00001156 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12681 00001159 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12682                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12683 0000115B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12684                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12685 00001160 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12686                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12687 00001162 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12688 00001165 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12689                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12690                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12691 00001168 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12692 0000116A C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12693 0000116E 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12694                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12695 00001172 46                      		inc	si
 12696                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12697                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12698 00001173 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12699 00001176 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12700                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12701                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12702 00001179 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12703                                  	
 12704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12705                                  		; cf = 0
 12706                                  		;clc
 12707                                  
 12708 0000117B C3                      		retn
 12709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12710                                  
 12711                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12712 0000117C B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12713 0000117E F9                      		stc
 12714                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12715 0000117F C3                      		retn
 12716                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12717                                  
 12718                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12719                                  
 12720                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12721                                  ;  set media id
 12722                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12723                                  
 12724                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12725                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12726                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12727                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12728                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12729                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12730                                  ;
 12731                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12732                                  ;
 12733                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12734                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12735                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12736                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12737                                  ;
 12738                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12739                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12740                                  ;
 12741                                  ; logic:
 12742                                  ;
 12743                                  ; {
 12744                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12745                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12746                                  ;	BootIo;
 12747                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12748                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12749                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12750                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12751                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12752                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12753                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12754                                  ;		};
 12755                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12756                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12757                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12758                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12759                                  ;		};
 12760                                  ;	else
 12761                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12762                                  ;
 12763                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12764                                  
 12765                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12766                                  SetMediaId:
 12767 00001180 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12768 00001183 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12769                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12770 00001187 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12771 00001189 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12772 0000118E 52                      		push	dx
 12773 0000118F E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12774 00001192 5A                      		pop	dx
 12775 00001193 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12776                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12777 00001195 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12778                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12779 0000119A 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12780 0000119C 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12781                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12782 000011A1 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12783 000011A3 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12784 000011A4 57                      		push	di
 12785 000011A5 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12786 000011A6 07                      		pop	es
 12787 000011A7 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12788 000011AA C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12789 000011AE C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12790 000011B1 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12791 000011B4 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12792                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12793                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12794 000011B7 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12795 000011B9 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12796 000011BA 1F                      		pop	ds
 12797 000011BB 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12798 000011BC 07                      		pop	es
 12799 000011BD E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12800 000011C0 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12801 000011C2 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12802 000011C7 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12803 000011CA C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12804                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12805                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12806 000011CF C3                      		retn
 12807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12808                                  
 12809                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12810 000011D0 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12811 000011D2 F9                      		stc
 12812                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12813 000011D3 C3                      		retn
