 14477                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14478                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14479                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14480                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14481                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14482                                  
 14483                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14484 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14485 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14485 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14485 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14486                                  
 14487                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14488 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14488 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14488 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14488 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14489 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14490                                  
 14491                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14492                                  
 14493                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14494                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14495                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14496                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14497                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14498                                  
 14499                                  chkopcnt:		
 14500 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14501 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14502                                  
 14503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14504                                  
 14505                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14506                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14507                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14508                                  ;
 14509                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14510                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14511                                  
 14512                                  mediacheck:	
 14513 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14514 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14515 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14516 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14517 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14518 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14519 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14520 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14521 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14522                                  					; set logical drive number
 14523 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14524 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14525                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14526                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14527 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14528 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14529 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14530 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14531                                  
 14532                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14533                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14534                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14535                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14536                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14537                                  ; status.
 14538                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14539 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14540 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14541                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14542                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14543                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14544                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14545 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14546                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14547                                  
 14548                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14549                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14550                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14551                                  
 14552 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14553 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14554 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14555 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14556 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14557 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14558 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14559 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14560 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14561                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14562 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14563                                  mediaret:				
 14564 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  
 14567                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14568                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14569                                  ; or write.
 14570                                  
 14571                                  mediadovolid:				
 14572 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14573 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14574 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14575 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14576 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14578                                  
 14579                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14580                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14581                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14582                                  ; dos.
 14583                                  ;
 14584                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14587                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14588                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14589                                  
 14590                                  checklatchio:	
 14591                                  
 14592                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14593                                  			
 14594 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14595 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14596                                  
 14597                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14598                                  
 14599 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14600 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14601                                  
 14602                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14603                                  ; expensive verification.
 14604                                  
 14605 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14606 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14607 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14608 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14609 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14610 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14611 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14612                                  checklatchret:				
 14613 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14614                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14615 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14616 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14617                                  checkret:				
 14618 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14622                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14623                                  ;
 14624                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14625                                  
 14626                                  checkfatvid:				
 14627 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14628 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14629 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14630                                  
 14631                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14632                                  
 14633                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14634                                  
 14635                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14636                                  
 14637                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14638                                  ;
 14639                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14640                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14641                                  ;
 14642                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14643                                  ;
 14644                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14645                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14646                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14647                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14648                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14649                                  ;
 14650                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14651                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14652                                  ; routine.)
 14653                                  ;
 14654                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14655                                  
 14656                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14657                                  check_vid:
 14658                                  
 14659                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14660                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14661                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14662                                  
 14663 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14664                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14665                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14666 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14667 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14668 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14669 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14670 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14671                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14672 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14673                                  					; if not fat system
 14674 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14675 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14676 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14677 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14678                                  					; definitely changed
 14679 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14680                                  
 14681 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14682                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14683 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14684                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14685                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14686                                  		;clc
 14687                                  checkfatret:				
 14688 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14689                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14690                                  
 14691                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14692                                  changed_drv:
 14693 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14694 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14695                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14696 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14697                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14698                                  
 14699                                  ; extended id check
 14700                                  
 14701                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14702                                  
 14703                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14704                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14705                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14706                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14707                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14708                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14709                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14710                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14711                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14712                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14713                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14714                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14715                                  ;
 14716                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14717                                  
 14718                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14719                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14720 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14721                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14722                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14723 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14724                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14725 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14726 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14727 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14728 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14729 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14730 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14731                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14732                                  					; don't know
 14733 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14734 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14735                                  					; reset the flag
 14736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14737                                  
 14738                                  ext_changed:
 14739 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14740                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14741 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14742                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14743                                  					; disk changed!
 14744                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14745                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14746                                  		;clc
 14747 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14748                                  
 14749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14750                                  
 14751                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14752                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14753                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14754                                  ;
 14755                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14756                                  
 14757                                  checkio:				
 14758 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14759 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14760 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14761 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14762 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14763 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14764 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14765 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14766 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14767 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14768 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14769 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14771                                  
 14772                                  checkioerr:				
 14773 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14774                                  
 14775                                  checkioret:				
 14776 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14777 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14779                                  
 14780                                  no_error_map:				
 14781 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14782                                  
 14783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14784                                  
 14785                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14786                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14787                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14788                                  
 14789                                  returnvid:		
 14790 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14791                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14792 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14793 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14794 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14795 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14796                                  
 14797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14798                                  
 14799                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14800                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14801                                  ;
 14802                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14803                                  ; **trashes si**
 14804                                  
 14805                                  media_set_vid:				
 14806 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14807                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14808                                  
 14809                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14810                                  
 14811                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14812                                  
 14813                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14814                                  
 14815                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14816                                  vid_into_packet:
 14817 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14818 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14819 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14820 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14821 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14822 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14823 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14824                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14825 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14826                                  
 14827                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14828                                  
 14829                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14830                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14831                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14832                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14833                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14834                                  ;
 14835                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14836                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14837                                  ;
 14838                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14839                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14840                                  ;		carry set
 14841                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14842                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14843                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14844                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14845                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14846                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14847                                  ;
 14848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14849                                  
 14850                                  hidensity:
 14851                                  
 14852                                  ; check for correct drive
 14853                                  		
 14854                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14855 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14856                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14857                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14858 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14859                                  
 14860                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14861                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14862                                  
 14863 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14864 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14865                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14866                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14867 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14868 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14869                                  
 14870                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14871                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14872                                  
 14873                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14874 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14875 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14876                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14877                                  					; ffOther
 14878 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14879 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14880                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14881                                  					; ff288
 14882 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14883 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14884 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14885                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14886                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14887 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14888                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14889                                  					; 2 sides
 14890                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14891 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14892 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14893                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14894                                  					; & head max
 14895                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14896 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14898                                  
 14899                                  Is720K:
 14900                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14901 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14902                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14903 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14905                                  
 14906                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14907                                  ;dofloppy:
 14908                                  		;retn
 14909                                  
 14910                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14911                                  
 14912                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14913                                  
 14914                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14915                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14916                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14917                                  ;
 14918                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14919                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14920                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14921                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14922                                  ;
 14923                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14924                                  ;
 14925                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14926                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14927                                  
 14928                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14929 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 14930 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 14931                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14932                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14933 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14934                                  
 14935                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14936                                  
 14937                                  scan_bds:				
 14938 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14939 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14940                                  
 14941                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14942                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14943                                  
 14944 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14945                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14946                                  get_next_bds:				
 14947 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14948                                  					; go to	next bds
 14949 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14950 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14951 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 14952 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 14953 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 14954                                  
 14955                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14956                                  
 14957                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14958                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14959                                  ;
 14960                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14961                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14962                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14963                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14964                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14965                                  
 14966                                  checkromchange:	
 14967                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14968                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14969 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14970                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14971                                  					; fchanged
 14972 000018DC C3                      		retn
 14973                                  
 14974                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14975                                  
 14976                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14977                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14978                                  ;
 14979                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14980                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14981                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14982                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14983                                  
 14984                                  resetchanged:	
 14985                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14986                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14987 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14988                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14989                                  					; ~fchanged
 14990 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 14991                                  
 14992                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14993                                  
 14994                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14995                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14996                                  ;
 14997                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14998                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14999                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15000                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15001                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15002                                  
 15003                                  haschange:
 15004                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15005                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15006 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15007                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15008                                  					; fchangeline
 15009 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 15010                                  
 15011                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15012                                  
 15013                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15014                                  
 15015                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15016                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15017                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15018                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15019                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15020                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15021                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15022                                  
 15023                                  ; set_volume_id
 15024                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15025                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15026                                  ;
 15027                                  ;   on entry:
 15028                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15029                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15030                                  ;
 15031                                  ;   on exit:
 15032                                  ;	carry clear:
 15033                                  ;	   successful call
 15034                                  ;	carry set
 15035                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15036                                  
 15037                                  set_volume_id:				
 15038 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15039 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15040 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15041 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15042 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15043 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15044 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15045 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15046                                  setvret:				
 15047                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15048                                  		; cf = 0
 15049                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15050 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15051 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15052 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15053                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15054                                  
 15055                                  seterr:					
 15056 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15057 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15058 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15060 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15061                                  
 15062                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15063                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15064                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15065                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15068                                  
 15069                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15070                                  
 15071                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15072                                  ;
 15073                                  ;   on entry:
 15074                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15075                                  ;
 15076                                  ;   on exit:
 15077                                  ;	carry clear
 15078                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15079                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15080                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15081                                  ;
 15082                                  ;	carry set:
 15083                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15084                                  
 15085                                  read_volume_id:
 15086 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15087 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15088 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15089 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15090 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15091 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15092 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15093 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15094 0000190B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15095 0000190E BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15096 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15097 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15098 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15099 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15100 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15101                                  					; # of fats
 15102 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15103                                  					; sectors / fat
 15104 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15105 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15106                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15107                                  					;
 15108                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15109                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15110 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15111                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15112                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15113 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15114                                  					; # root dir entries
 15115 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15116 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15117                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15118                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15119 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15120                                  next_sec:				
 15121 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15122 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15123                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15124                                  					; get sector #
 15125 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15126                                  					; sectors / track
 15127 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15128 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15129                                  
 15130                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15131                                  
 15132 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15133                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15134 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15135 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15136 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15137                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15138 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15139 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15140 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15141                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15142 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15143 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15144 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15145                                  fvid_loop:
 15146                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15147 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15148                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15149 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15150 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15151 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15152 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15153 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15154                                  ent_loop:				
 15155 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15156 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15157 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15158 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15159                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15160                                  					; next sector
 15161 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15162                                  notfound:
 15163                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15164                                  		;xor	si, si
 15165 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15166                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15167                                  
 15168                                  found_vid:
 15169                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15170                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15171 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15172 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15173 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15174 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15175 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15176 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15177 0000197B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15178 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15179                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15180 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15181                                  		;xor	al, al
 15182                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15183 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15184 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15185                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15186                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15187                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15188 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15189 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15190                                  fvid_ret:
 15191                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15192 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15193                                  				
 15194 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15195                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15196                                  		; cf = 0
 15197                                  		;clc
 15198                                  rvidret:
 15199 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15200 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15201 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15202 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15203                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  
 15205                                  no_vid:
 15206 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15207                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15208                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15209 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15210                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15211                                  
 15212                                  readviderr:				
 15213 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15214 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15215 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15216                                  
 15217                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15218                                  
 15219                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15220                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15221                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15222 00001995 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15223                                  		;
 15224                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15225                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15226                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15227                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15228 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15229 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15230                                  		;
 15231 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15232 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15233                                  
 15234                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15235                                  
 15236                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15237                                  ;
 15238                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15239                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15240                                  
 15241                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15242 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15243 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15244 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15245                                  		
 15246                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15247                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15248                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15249                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15250                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15251                                  		;cld
 15252                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15253 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15254                                  
 15255 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15256 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15257 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15258 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15259 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15260                                  
 15261                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15262                                  
 15263                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15264                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15265                                  ;
 15266                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15267                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15268                                  
 15269                                  check_volume_id:
 15270 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15271 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15272                                  		
 15273                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15274                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15275                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15276                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15277                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15278                                  		;cld
 15279                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15280 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15281                                  
 15282 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15283 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15284 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15285 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15286                                  
 15287                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15288                                  
 15289                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15290                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15291                                  ;
 15292                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15293                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15294                                  ;
 15295                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15296                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15297                                  ;
 15298                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15299                                  
 15300                                  fat_check:		
 15301 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15302 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15303 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15304 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15305                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15306 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15307 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15308                                  okret1:					
 15309 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15310 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15311                                  
 15312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15313                                  
 15314                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15315                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15316                                  
 15317                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15318                                  
 15319                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15320                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15321                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15322                                  
 15323                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15324                                  
 15325                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15326                                  		;db 0
 15327                                  
 15328                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15329                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15330                                  
 15331                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15332 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15333                                  %endif
 15334                                  
 15335                                  ;align 16
 15336                                  
 15337                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15338                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15339                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15340                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15341                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15342                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15343                                  
 15344                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15345                                  
 15346                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15347                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15348                                  ; ============================================================================
 15349                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15352                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 15356                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT

 15358                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15359                                  
 15360                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 15361                                  
 15362                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15363                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 15364                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15365                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 15366                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15367                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 15368                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15369                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 15370                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15371                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 15372                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15373                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 15374                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15375                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 15376                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 15377                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15378                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 15379                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 15380                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15381                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 15382                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 15383                                  
 15384                                  ; 21/10/2022
 15385                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15386                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 15387                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 15388                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 15389                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15390                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 15391                                  
 15392                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15393                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 15394                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15395                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 15396                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 15397                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 15398                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 15399                                  ;
 15400                                  ;
 15401                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 15402                                  ;
 15403                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 15404                                  ;
 15405                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 15406                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15407                                  ;
 15408                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 15409                                  ;
 15410                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 15411                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15412                                  ;
 15413                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 15414                                  ;
 15415                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 15416                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15417                                  ;value.
 15418                                  ;
 15419                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15420                                  ;
 15421                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15422                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15423                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15424                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15425                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15426                                  ;
 15427                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15428                                  ;
 15429                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15430                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15431                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15432                                  ;
 15433                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15434                                  ;
 15435                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15436                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15437                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15438                                  ;
 15439                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15440                                  ;
 15441                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15442                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15443                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15444                                  ;
 15445                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15446                                  ;
 15447                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15448                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15449                                  ;
 15450                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15451                                  ;
 15452                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15453                                  ;
 15454                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15455                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15456                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15457                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15458                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15459                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15460                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15461                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15462                                  ;memory.
 15463                                  ;NOTES:
 15464                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15465                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15466                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15467                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15468                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15469                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15470                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15471                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15472                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15473                                  
 15474                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15475                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15476                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15477                                  
 15478                                  ;include version.inc
 15479                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15480                                  
 15481                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15482                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15483                                  
 15484                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15485                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15486                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15487                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15488                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15489                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15490                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15491                                  
 15492                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15493                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15494                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15495                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15496                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15497                                  
 15498                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15499                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15500                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15501                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15502                                  
 15503                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15504                                  
 15505                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15506                                  				; currently 0.
 15507                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15508                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15509                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15510                                  
 15511                                  ;      if1
 15512                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15513                                  ;      endif
 15514                                  
 15515                                         ;******************************
 15516                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15517                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15518                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15519                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15520                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15521                                         ;******************************
 15522                                  
 15523                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15524                                  ; device definitions
 15525                                  
 15526                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15527                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15528                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15529                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15530                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15531                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15532                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15533                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15534                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15535                                  
 15536                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15537                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15538 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15539 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15540 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15541 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15542 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15543                                  .size:
 15544                                  endstruc
 15545                                  
 15546                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15547                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15548 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15549 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15550 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15551 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15552 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15553                                  .size:
 15554                                  endstruc
 15555                                  
 15556                                  ;Status word masks
 15557                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15558                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15559                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15560                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15561                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15562                                  
 15563                                  ;Function codes
 15564                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15565                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15566                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15567                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15568                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15569                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15570                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15571                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15572                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15573                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15574                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15575                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15576                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15577                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15578                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15579                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15580                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 15581                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 15582                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 15583                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
