 30925                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30926                                  
 30927                                  isSpecified:
 30928                                  	push	ax
 30929                                  
 30930                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30931                                  	mov	bl,al
 30932                                  
 30933                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30934                                  	;
 30935                                  	;push	ds
 30936                                  	;push	cs
 30937                                  	;pop	ds
 30938                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30939                                  	;pop	ds
 30940                                  	
 30941                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30942                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30943                                  
 30944                                  	pop	ax
 30945                                  	retn
 30946                                  
 30947                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30948                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30949                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30950                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30951                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30952                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30953                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30954                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30955                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30956                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30957                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30958                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30959                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30960                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30961                                  
 30962                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30963                                  
 30964                                  shrinkMCB:
 30965                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30966                                  	push	bx
 30967                                  	push	cx
 30968                                  	push	es
 30969                                  
 30970                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30971                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30972                                  
 30973                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30974                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30975                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30976                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30977                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30978                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30979                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30980                                  
 30981                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30982                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30983                                  
 30984                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30985                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30986                                  
 30987                                  	add	ax,bx
 30988                                  	inc	ax
 30989                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30990                                  
 30991                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30992                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30993                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30994                                  	; ax > 0
 30995                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30996                                  
 30997                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30998                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30999                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31000                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31001                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31002                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31003                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31004                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31005                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31006                                  
 31007                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31008                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31009                                  
 31010                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31011                                  	; cf=0
 31012                                  	;clc
 31013                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31014                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31015                                  smE:	
 31016                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31017                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31018                                  	;stc
 31019                                  smX:	
 31020                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31021                                  	pop	es
 31022                                  	pop	cx
 31023                                  	pop	bx
 31024                                  	retn
 31025                                  
 31026                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31027                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31028                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31029                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31030                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31031                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31032                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31033                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31034                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31035                                  ;
 31036                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31037                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31038                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31039                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31040                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31041                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31042                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31043                                  ;       Endif
 31044                                  ;    Endif
 31045                                  ; Endif
 31046                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31047                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31048                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31049                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31050                                  ;    ENDIF
 31051                                  ; ENDIF
 31052                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31053                                  
 31054                                  _hideUMB_:
 31055                                  	push	bx
 31056                                  	push	dx
 31057                                  	push	es
 31058                                  
 31059                                  	mov	al,cl
 31060                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31061                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31062                                  
 31063                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31064                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31065                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31066                                  
 31067                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31068                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31069                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31070                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31071                                  
 31072                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31073                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31074                                  
 31075                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31076                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31077                                  
 31078                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31079                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31080                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31081                                  hu_10:	
 31082                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31083                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31084                                  
 31085                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31086                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31087                                  
 31088                                  	mov	dx,es
 31089                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31090                                  
 31091                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31092                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31093                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31094                                  
 31095                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31096                                  hu_30:	
 31097                                  	mov	al,cl
 31098                                  
 31099                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31100                                  
 31101                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31102                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31103                                  
 31104                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31105                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31106                                  hu_X:	
 31107                                  	pop	es
 31108                                  	pop	dx
 31109                                  	pop	bx
 31110                                  	retn
 31111                                  
 31112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31113                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31115                                  ; Entry:  None
 31116                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31117                                  ; Error:  None
 31118                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31119                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31120                                  
 31121                                  UnFreeze:
 31122                                  	push	ax
 31123                                  	push	es
 31124                                  
 31125                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31126                                  	jc	short ufX
 31127                                  
 31128                                  	mov	es,ax
 31129                                  
 31130                                  ; ------------------------------
 31131                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31132                                  ; ------------------------------
 31133                                  
 31134                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31135                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31136                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31137                                  uf20:	
 31138                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31139                                  
 31140                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31141                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31142                                  
 31143                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31144                                  	mov     ax,es
 31145                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31146                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31147                                  	inc     ax
 31148                                  	mov     es,ax
 31149                                  
 31150                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31151                                  ufX:	
 31152                                  	pop	es
 31153                                  	pop	ax
 31154                                  	retn
 31155                                  
 31156                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31157                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31158                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31159                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31160                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31161                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31162                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31163                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31164                                  
 31165                                  isFrozMCB:
 31166                                  	;push	ax
 31167                                  
 31168                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31169                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31170                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31171                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31172                                  
 31173                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31174                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31175                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31176                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31177                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31178                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31179                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31180                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31181                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31182                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31183                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31184                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31185                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31186                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31187                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31188                                  ifmX:	
 31189                                  	;pop	ax
 31190                                  	retn
 31191                                  
 31192                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31193                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31194                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31195                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31196                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31197                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31198                                  ; USES:     None
 31199                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31200                                  
 31201                                  frezMCB:
 31202                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31203                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31204                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31205                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31206                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31207                                  	retn
 31208                                  
 31209                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31210                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31211                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31212                                  ; Entry:  None
 31213                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31214                                  ; Error:  None
 31215                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31217                                  
 31218                                  FreezeUM:
 31219                                  	push	ax
 31220                                  	push	cx
 31221                                  	push	dx
 31222                                  	push	es
 31223                                  
 31224                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31225                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31226                                  
 31227                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31228                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31229                                  
 31230                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31231                                  	mov	es,ax
 31232                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31233                                  
 31234                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31235                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31236                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31237                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31238                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31239                                  
 31240                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31241                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31242                                  
 31243                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31244                                  fum20:	
 31245                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31246                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31247                                  
 31248                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31249                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31250                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31251                                  
 31252                                  	call	frezMCB
 31253                                  fum30:	
 31254                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31255                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31256                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31257                                  
 31258                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31259                                  	mov     ax,es
 31260                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31261                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31262                                  	inc     ax
 31263                                  	mov     es,ax
 31264                                  	
 31265                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31266                                  
 31267                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31268                                  	pop	dx
 31269                                  	pop	cx
 31270                                  	pop	ax
 31271                                  	retn
 31272                                  
 31273                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31274                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31275                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31276                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31277                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31278                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31279                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31280                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31281                                  
 31282                                  UmbTest:
 31283                                  	push	ax
 31284                                  	push	bx
 31285                                  	push	ds
 31286                                  	push	es
 31287                                  
 31288                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31289                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31290                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31291                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31292                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31293                                  
 31294                                  	pop	es
 31295                                  	pop	ds
 31296                                  	pop	bx
 31297                                  	pop	ax
 31298                                  	retn
 31299                                  
 31300                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31301                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31302                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31303                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31304                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31305                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31306                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31307                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31308                                  
 31309                                  WalkMem:
 31310                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31311                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31312                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31313                                  		   	
 31314                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31315                                  	int	21h
 31316                                  
 31317                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31318                                  	mov	es,ax
 31319                                  
 31320                                  ; ------------------------------
 31321                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31322                                  ; ------------------------------
 31323                                  
 31324                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31325                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31326                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31327                                  
 31328                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31329                                  
 31330                                  	mov     bx,es
 31331                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31332                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31333                                  	inc     bx
 31334                                  	mov     es,bx
 31335                                  		
 31336                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31337                                  um20:	
 31338                                  	mov	ax,es
 31339                                  
 31340                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31341                                  
 31342                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31343                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31344                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31345                                  	retn
 31346                                  
 31347                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31348                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31349                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31350                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31351                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31352                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31353                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31354                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31355                                  
 31356                                  hl_unlink:
 31357                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31358                                  
 31359                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31360                                  	;
 31361                                  	;push	ds
 31362                                  	;push	cs
 31363                                  	;pop	ds
 31364                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31365                                  	;pop	ds
 31366                                  
 31367                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31368                                  
 31369                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31370                                  	int	21h
 31371                                  	retn
 31372                                  
 31373                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31374                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31375                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31376                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31377                                  
 31378                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31379                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31380                                  
 31381                                  ;   Modification log:
 31382                                  ;
 31383                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31384                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31385                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31386                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31387                                  
 31388                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31389                                  
 31390                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31391                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31392                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31393                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31394                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31395                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31396                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31397                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31398                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31399                                  
 31400                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31401                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31402                                  
 31403                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31404                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31405                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31406                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31407                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31408                                  ;    every command execution.
 31409                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31410                                  
 31411                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31412                                  	;
 31413                                  	;push	ds
 31414                                  	;push	cs
 31415                                  	;pop	ds
 31416                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31417                                  	;pop	ds	
 31418                                  
 31419                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31420                                  
 31421                                  	or	al,al
 31422                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31423                                  
 31424                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31425                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31426                                  	retn			; that.
 31427                                  uhu10:	
 31428                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31429                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31430                                  
 31431                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31432                                  	;
 31433                                  	;push	es
 31434                                  	;push	cs
 31435                                  	;pop	es
 31436                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31437                                  	;pop	ds	
 31438                                  
 31439                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31440                                  
 31441                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31442                                  
 31443                                  	pop	ax
 31444                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31445                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31446                                  	retn
 31447                                  
 31448                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31449                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31450                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31451                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31452                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31453                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31454                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31455                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31456                                  
 31457                                  he_unlink:
 31458                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31459                                  
 31460                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31461                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31462                                  
 31463                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31464                                  	int	21h
 31465                                  	retn
 31466                                  
 31467                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31468                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31469                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31470                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31471                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31472                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31473                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31474                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31475                                  
 31476                                  FreeUMBs:
 31477                                  	push	ax
 31478                                  	push	es
 31479                                  
 31480                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31481                                  	jc	short fusX
 31482                                  
 31483                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31484                                  fus10:	
 31485                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31486                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31487                                  	call	freeMCB
 31488                                  fus20:	   
 31489                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31490                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31491                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31492                                  
 31493                                  	mov	ax,es
 31494                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31495                                  	inc	ax
 31496                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31497                                  
 31498                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31499                                  fusX:	
 31500                                  	pop	es
 31501                                  	pop	ax
 31502                                  	retn
 31503                                  
 31504                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31505                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31506                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31507                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31508                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31509                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31510                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31512                                  
 31513                                  isHideMCB:
 31514                                  	;push	ax
 31515                                  
 31516                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31517                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31518                                  
 31519                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31520                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31521                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31522                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31523                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31524                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31525                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31526                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31527                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31528                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31529                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31530                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31531                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31532                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31533                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31534                                  ihm_x:	
 31535                                  	;pop	ax
 31536                                  	retn
 31537                                  
 31538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31539                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31540                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31541                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31542                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31543                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31544                                  ; USES:     AX
 31545                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31546                                  
 31547                                  freeMCB:
 31548                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31549                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31550                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31551                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31552                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31553                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31554                                  	retn
 31555                                  
 31556                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31557                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31558                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31559                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31560                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31561                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31562                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31563                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31564                                  
 31565                                  HeadUmb:
 31566                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31567                                  
 31568                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31569                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31570                                  	;push	es
 31571                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31572                                  
 31573                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31574                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31575                                  
 31576                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31577                                  	int	21h
 31578                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31579                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31580                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31581                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31582                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31583                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31584                                  
 31585                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31586                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31587                                  xhu_e:	
 31588                                  	;stc
 31589                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31590                                  xhu_x:	
 31591                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31592                                  	;pop	es	
 31593                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31594                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31595                                  	retn
 31596                                  
 31597                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31598                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31599                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31600                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31601                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31602                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31603                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31604                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31605                                  
 31606                                  linkumb:
 31607                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31608                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31609                                  
 31610                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31611                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31612                                  
 31613                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31614                                  	mov	bx,1
 31615                                  	int	21h
 31616                                  lumbX:
 31617                                  	retn
 31618                                  
 31619                                  %endif

 31621                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 31624                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31625                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991)

 31628                                  
 31629                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31630                                  ;
 31631                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31632                                  ;
 31633                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31634                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31635                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31636                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31637                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31638                                  ;
 31639                                  ;	Output : none
 31640                                  ;
 31641                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31642                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31643                                  ;
 31644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31645                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31646                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31647                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31648                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31650                                  
 31651                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31652                                  InitDevLoad:
 31653                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31654                                  	; ds = cs
 31655 00002773 803E[851E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31656                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31657                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31658 00002778 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31659                                  
 31660                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31661                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31662                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31663                                  ;
 31664                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31665                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31666                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31667                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31668                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31669                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31670                                  ;
 31671                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31672                                  ;
 31673                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31674                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31675                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31676                                  ;	pushf
 31677                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31678                                  ;	popf
 31679                                  ;
 31680                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31681                                  ;
 31682                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31683                                  
 31684                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31685                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31686                                  InitForConv:
 31687                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31688                                  	; ds = cs
 31689 0000277A E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31690                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31691 0000277D 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31692 0000277F E83E04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31693 00002782 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31694 00002785 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31695                                  					;  in low memory
 31696                                  InitForHi:
 31697                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31698                                  	; ds = cs
 31699                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31700                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31701                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31702 00002787 A1[7B1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31703 0000278A 8B16[771E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31704 0000278E 0316[791E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31705 00002792 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31706                                  
 31707                                  InitForLo:
 31708                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31709                                  	; ds = cs
 31710                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31711 00002794 C606[851E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31712                                  initforlo_x:
 31713                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31714                                  	; ds = cs
 31715                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31716                                  					;  we are loading low
 31717                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31718                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31719 00002799 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31720 0000279C 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31721                                  idl1:
 31722 000027A0 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31723                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31724                                  	; ds = cs
 31725                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31726                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31727                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31728                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31729 000027A3 A3[6A1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31730 000027A6 8916[6C1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31731 000027AA C706[6E1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31732 000027B0 A3[701E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31733 000027B3 C3                      	retn
 31734                                  
 31735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31736                                  ;
 31737                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31738                                  ;
 31739                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31740                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31741                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31742                                  ;		   current UMB
 31743                                  ;
 31744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31745                                  
 31746                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31747                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31748                                  	; ds = cs
 31749                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31750                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31751                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31752 000027B4 A1[791E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31753 000027B7 0306[771E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31754 000027BB 2B06[7B1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31755                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31756                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31757                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31758                                  	;stc
 31759                                  	;retn
 31760                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31761 000027BF 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31762 000027C2 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31763                                  spcinumb1:
 31764 000027C4 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31765                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31766                                  	; ds = cs
 31767 000027C5 3B06[681E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31768                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31769                                  spcinumb2:
 31770 000027C9 C3                      	retn
 31771                                  
 31772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31773                                  ;
 31774                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31775                                  ;
 31776                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31777                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31778                                  ;
 31779                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31780                                  
 31781                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31782                                  ;
 31783                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31784                                  ;	push	ds
 31785                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31786                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31787                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31788                                  ;	pop	ds
 31789                                  ;
 31790                                  ;	inc	ax
 31791                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31792                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31793                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31794                                  ;	retn
 31795                                  
 31796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31797                                  ;
 31798                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31799                                  ;
 31800                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31801                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31802                                  ;		 the device.
 31803                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31804                                  ;
 31805                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31806                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31807                                  ;	UMB.
 31808                                  ;
 31809                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31810                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31811                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31812                                  ;
 31813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31814                                  
 31815                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31816                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31817                                  
 31818                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31819                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31820                                  	; ds = cs
 31821 000027CA BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31822 000027CD B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31823 000027D0 CD21                    	int	21h
 31824                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31825                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31826                                  
 31827 000027D2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31828                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 31829                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31830 000027D4 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 31831                                  
 31832 000027D6 4B                      	dec	bx
 31833                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31834                                  	; ds = cs
 31835 000027D7 391E[681E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31836                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31837 000027DB 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31838                                  
 31839 000027DD 43                      	inc	bx
 31840                                  
 31841 000027DE B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31842 000027E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 31843 000027E3 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31844                                  
 31845                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31846                                  	;dec	ax
 31847                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31848                                  	;
 31849                                  PrepareMark:
 31850 000027E5 1E                      	push	ds
 31851 000027E6 48                      	dec	ax
 31852 000027E7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31853 000027E9 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31854 000027EF C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31855 000027F5 40                      	inc	ax
 31856 000027F6 1F                      	pop	ds
 31857                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31858                                  	; ds = cs
 31859                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31860                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31861                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31862                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 31863 000027F7 891E[791E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31864 000027FB A3[771E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31865 000027FE A3[7B1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31866                                  	;
 31867                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31868                                  	; cf=0
 31869                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31870 00002801 C3                      	retn
 31871                                  
 31872                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31873                                  %if 1
 31874                                  gufd_err:
 31875 00002802 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 31876                                  gufd_error:
 31877 00002804 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31878 00002806 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 31879 00002807 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 31880                                  %endif
 31881                                  
 31882                                  ; 09/09/2023
 31883                                  %if 0
 31884                                  gufd_err:
 31885                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31886                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31887                                  	; ds = cs
 31888                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31889                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31890                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31891                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31892                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31893                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31894                                  	stc
 31895                                  	retn
 31896                                  %endif

 31898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31899                                  ;
 31900                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31901                                  ;
 31902                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31903                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31904                                  ;
 31905                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31906                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31907                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31908                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31909                                  ;
 31910                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31911                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31912                                  ;
 31913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31914                                  
 31915                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31916                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31917                                  
 31918                                  DevSetMark:
 31919 00002809 06                      	push	es
 31920 0000280A 57                      	push	di
 31921 0000280B 1E                      	push	ds
 31922 0000280C 56                      	push	si
 31923 0000280D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31924 0000280F 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31925 00002815 40                      	inc	ax
 31926 00002816 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31927                                  
 31928                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31929                                  
 31930 0000281A 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31931                                  	
 31932                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31933                                  	; ds = cs
 31934                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31935 0000281B C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 31936                                  
 31937 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31938 00002821 FC                      	cld
 31939                                  dsm_again:
 31940 00002822 AC                      	lodsb
 31941 00002823 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31942 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31943 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31944 00002829 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31945                                  isit_slash:
 31946 0000282B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31947 0000282D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31948 0000282F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31949 00002831 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31950                                  isit_null:
 31951 00002833 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31952 00002835 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31953 00002837 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31954                                  
 31955 00002839 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31956 0000283C B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31957                                  dsm_next_char:
 31958 0000283F AC                      	lodsb
 31959 00002840 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31960 00002842 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31961 00002844 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31962 00002846 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31963 00002848 AA                      	stosb
 31964 00002849 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31965                                  blankout:
 31966 0000284B E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31967 0000284D B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31968 0000284F F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31969                                  dsm_exit:
 31970 00002851 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31971 00002852 5E                      	pop	si
 31972 00002853 1F                      	pop	ds
 31973 00002854 5F                      	pop	di
 31974 00002855 07                      	pop	es
 31975 00002856 C3                      	retn
 31976                                  
 31977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31978                                  ;
 31979                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31980                                  ;
 31981                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31982                                  ;
 31983                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31984                                  ;
 31985                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31986                                  ;	in DevSize
 31987                                  ;
 31988                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31989                                  
 31990                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31991                                  SizeDevice:
 31992                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31993                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31994 00002857 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31995 00002858 06                      	push	es
 31996 00002859 1F                      	pop	ds
 31997 0000285A 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31998 0000285C B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31999 0000285F CD21                    	int	21h
 32000 00002861 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32001                                  
 32002 00002863 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32003 00002865 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32004 00002868 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32005 0000286A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32006 0000286C CD21                    	int	21h
 32007 0000286E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32008 00002870 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32009 00002873 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32010 00002876 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32011 0000287A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32012 0000287C 2EC706[681E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32013                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32014 00002883 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32015                                  szdev1:
 32016 00002885 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32017 00002887 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32018 00002889 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32019 0000288B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32020 0000288D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32021                                  	;
 32022                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32023 0000288F 2E3B06[861E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32024                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32025                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32026 00002894 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32027                                  
 32028 00002896 2EA1[861E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32029                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32030 0000289A F8                      	clc
 32031                                  szdev2:
 32032 0000289B 2EA3[681E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32033                                  
 32034                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32035                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32036                                  	; cf=0
 32037                                  	;clc
 32038                                  sd_close:
 32039 0000289F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32040                                  					;  carry flag
 32041 000028A0 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32042 000028A3 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32043 000028A5 9D                      	popf
 32044                                  sd_err:
 32045                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32046                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32047 000028A6 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32048 000028A7 C3                      	retn
 32049                                  
 32050                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32051                                  ;
 32052                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32053                                  ;
 32054                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32055                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32056                                  ;
 32057                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32058                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32059                                  ;
 32060                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 32061                                  ;
 32062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32063                                  
 32064                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32065                                  ExecDev:
 32066 000028A8 2E8B1E[6A1E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]
 32067 000028AD 2E891E[811E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecAddr],bx	; Load the parameter block
 32068                                  					;  block for exec with
 32069                                  					;  Load address
 32070 000028B2 2E891E[831E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx
 32071 000028B7 8CCB                    	mov	bx,cs
 32072 000028B9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32073 000028BB BB[811E]                	mov	bx,DevExecAddr		;es:bx points to parameters
 32074                                  	;mov	al,3	; (load program only)
 32075                                  	;mov	ah,EXEC ; 4Bh
 32076                                  	; 04/07/2023
 32077 000028BE B8034B                  	mov	ax,(EXEC<<8)|03h
 32078 000028C1 CD21                    	int	21h			;load in the device driver
 32079                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 32080                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32081                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32082                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 32083 000028C3 C3                      	retn
 32084                                  
 32085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32086                                  ;
 32087                                  ; procedure : RetFromUM
 32088                                  ;
 32089                                  ;	Input : None
 32090                                  ;	Output : ConvLoad set if didn't previously call HideUMBs
