 32407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32408                                  ;
 32409                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32410                                  ;
 32411                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32412                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32413                                  ;
 32414                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32415                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32416                                  ;
 32417                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32418                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32419                                  ;
 32420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32421                                  
 32422                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32423                                  
 32424                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32425                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32426                                  GetHexNum:
 32427 0000298A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32428 0000298C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32429                                  ghn_next:
 32430 0000298E 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32431 00002991 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32432 00002994 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32433 00002996 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32434 00002999 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32435 0000299B 50                      	push	ax
 32436 0000299C 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32437 0000299E E82206                  	call	delim
 32438 000029A1 58                      	pop	ax
 32439                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32440 000029A2 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32441 000029A5 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32442 000029A7 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32443                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32444                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32445 000029AA 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32446                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32447                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32448                                  ghn_shift1:
 32449 000029AC D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32450 000029AE D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32451 000029B0 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32452 000029B2 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32453 000029B4 46                      	inc	si
 32454 000029B5 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32455                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32456 000029B7 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32457 000029BA 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32458 000029BD F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32459 000029C1 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32460                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32461                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32462                                  ghn_shift2:
 32463 000029C3 F8                      	clc
 32464 000029C4 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32465 000029C6 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32466 000029C8 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32467 000029CA F8                      	clc
 32468 000029CB C3                      	retn
 32469                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32470                                  ghn_err:
 32471                                  gnib_err:
 32472 000029CC F9                      	stc
 32473                                  ghn_ret:
 32474                                  gnib_ret:
 32475 000029CD C3                      	retn
 32476                                  
 32477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32478                                  ;
 32479                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32480                                  ;
 32481                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32482                                  ;
 32483                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32484                                  ;
 32485                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32486                                  ;
 32487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32488                                  
 32489                                  GetNibble:
 32490 000029CE 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32491                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32492                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32493 000029D1 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32494 000029D3 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32495 000029D6 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32496 000029D8 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32497 000029DB C3                      	retn
 32498                                  is_it_hex:
 32499 000029DC 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32500                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32501                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32502 000029DF 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32503 000029E1 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32504 000029E4 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32505 000029E6 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32506 000029E9 C3                      	retn
 32507                                  
 32508                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32509                                  ;gnib_err:
 32510                                  ;	stc
 32511                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32512                                  ;	retn

 32519                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 32520                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data

 32526                                  
 32527                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32528                                  ;
 32529                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32530                                  ;
 32531                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32532                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32533                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32534                                  ;			; DS = data
 32535                                  ;
 32536                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32537                                  ;
 32538                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32539                                  ;
 32540                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32541                                  
 32542                                  umb_insert:
 32543 000029EA 1E                      	push	ds
 32544                                  
 32545                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32546                                  	; ds = cs
 32547                                  
 32548                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32549 000029EB 8E1E[941E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32550                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32551 000029EF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32552 000029F3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32553 000029F5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32554                                  ui_next:
 32555 000029F7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32556                                  					;    new block
 32557 000029F9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32558                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32559                                  					;    last
 32560 000029FB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32561 00002A01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32562                                  					; N: get next block
 32563 00002A03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32564                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32565 00002A05 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32566 00002A08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32567                                  
 32568                                  ui_insert:
 32569 00002A0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32570 00002A0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32571                                  
 32572 00002A0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32573 00002A0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32574                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32575 00002A11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32576                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32577 00002A16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32578                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32579 00002A1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32580                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32581 00002A20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32582                                  
 32583                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32584                                  
 32585 00002A26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32586 00002A28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32587 00002A2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32588                                  					; mark as free
 32589 00002A35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32590                                  					; start & end of new block
 32591 00002A38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32592                                  
 32593                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32594                                  	
 32595 00002A3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32596 00002A3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32597 00002A40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32598 00002A42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32599                                  
 32600                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32601                                  					; this block
 32602 00002A43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32603                                  	
 32604 00002A45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32605 00002A4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32606 00002A52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32607 00002A56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32608                                  
 32609 00002A5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32610                                  
 32611                                  ui_append:
 32612                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32613 00002A5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32614 00002A64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32615                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32616                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32617                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32618 00002A6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32619                                  
 32620 00002A70 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32621 00002A72 40                      	inc	ax
 32622 00002A73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32623                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32624 00002A75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32625                                  
 32626 00002A77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32627                                  
 32628 00002A79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32629 00002A7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32630 00002A86 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32631 00002A8A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32632                                  
 32633                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32634 00002A91 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32635 00002A93 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32636 00002A99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32637                                  					; mark as free
 32638 00002AA0 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32639 00002AA1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32640                                  ui_done:
 32641                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32642 00002AA6 1F                      	pop	ds
 32643                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32644                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32645                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32646 00002AA7 C3                      	retn
 32647

 32649                                  ;
 32650                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 32651                                  ;
 32652                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 32653                                  ;

 32656                                  AllocUMB:
 32657                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32658                                  	; ds = cs

 32661                                  au_next:
 32662 00002AAD E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 32663 00002AB0 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 32664 00002AB2 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 32665 00002AB5 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 32666                                  au_coalesce:
 32667                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32668                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 32669                                  ;au_exit:
 32670                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 32671                                  ;	; ds = cs
 32672                                  ;	retn
 32673                                  
 32674                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32675                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32676                                  
 32677                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32678                                  
 32679                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32680                                  ;
 32681                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32682                                  ;
 32683                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32684                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32685                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32686                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32687                                  ;
 32688                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32689                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32690                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32691                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32692                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32693                                  ;
 32694                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32695                                  
 32696                                  umb_coalesce:
 32697                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32698                                  	; ds = cs
 32699 00002AB7 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32700                                  
 32701 00002AB8 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32702                                  
 32703                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32704                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32705 00002ABA 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32706 00002ABE 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32707                                  uc_nextfree:
 32708 00002AC3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32709 00002AC5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32710                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32711 00002AC7 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32712 00002ACC 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32713                                  					; N: get next arena
 32714 00002ACE E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32715 00002AD1 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32716 00002AD3 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32717                                  uc_again:
 32718 00002AD5 E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32719 00002AD8 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32720                                  uc_check:
 32721 00002ADA 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32722 00002ADF 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32723                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32724 00002AE1 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32725 00002AE6 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32726                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32727 00002AE7 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32728 00002AEB 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32729 00002AEE 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32730 00002AF0 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32731                                  
 32732                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32733                                  ;uc_done:
 32734                                  	;retn

 32745 00002AF2 E827DF                  	call	IsXMSLoaded

 32749                                  	; 31/12/2022

 32751                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 32752 00002AFB 8C06[941E]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 32753 00002AFF B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 32754 00002B02 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 32755                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 32756                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 32757 00002B04 891E[7D1E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 32758 00002B08 8C06[7F1E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 32759                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32760 00002B0C 803E[931E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0

 32762                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 32783                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32784                                  ;
 32785                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32786                                  ;
 32787                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32788                                  ;
 32789                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32790                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32791                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32792                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32793                                  ;				NC
 32794                                  ;			  else 
 32795                                  ;				CY
 32796                                  ;
 32797                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32798                                  ;
 32799                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32800                                  
 32801                                  umb_allocate:
 32802                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32803                                  	; ds = cs
 32804 00002B20 50                      	push	ax
 32805 00002B21 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32806 00002B23 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32807                                  					;   possible
 32808                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32809 00002B26 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32810                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32811                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32812                                  					; the largest UMB
 32813 00002B2A 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32814 00002B2C 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32815                                  	
 32816 00002B2E B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32817                                  
 32818                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32819 00002B30 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32820                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32821                                  
 32822 00002B34 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32823                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32824                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32825 00002B37 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32826                                  ua_err:
 32827 00002B39 F9                      	stc	
 32828                                  
 32829                                  	;clc
 32830                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32831                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32832                                  	; cf=0
 32833                                  	;clc 
 32834                                  ua_done:
 32835 00002B3A 58                      	pop	ax
 32836 00002B3B C3                      	retn
 32837                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32838                                  ;ua_err:
 32839                                  	;stc
 32840                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 32841                                  
 32842                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 32844                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32845                                  ;
 32846                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32847                                  ;
 32848                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32849                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32850                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32851                                  ;
 32852                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32853                                  
 32854                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32855                                  get_next:
 32856 00002B3C 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32857 00002B41 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32858                                  _get_next_:
 32859 00002B43 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32860 00002B45 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32861 00002B49 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32862 00002B4A 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32863                                  	;clc
 32864                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32865                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32866                                  	; cf=0
 32867                                  	;clc
 32868 00002B4C C3                      	retn
 32869                                  gn_err:
 32870 00002B4D F9                      	stc
 32871                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32872                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32873 00002B4E C3                      	retn

 32875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32876                                  ;
 32877                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32878                                  ;
 32879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32880                                  
 32881                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32882                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32883                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32884                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32885                                  	; ds = cs
 32886 00002B4F E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 32887 00002B52 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32888                                  
 32889                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32890                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32891                                  
 32892                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32893                                  	; ds = cs
 32894                                  
 32895 00002B54 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32896 00002B56 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32897 00002B58 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32898                                  
 32899 00002B5A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32900 00002B5C 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32901                                  
 32902 00002B5E F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32903                                  
 32904                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32905                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32906 00002B60 49                      	dec	cx
 32907 00002B61 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32908                                  	
 32909 00002B63 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32910 00002B69 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32911                                  					
 32912 00002B70 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32913 00002B74 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32914                                  
 32915                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32916                                  
 32917 00002B7B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32918 00002B7D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32919 00002B83 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32920                                  					; mark as free 
 32921 00002B8A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32922 00002B8B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32923                                  
 32924                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32925                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32926 00002B90 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32927 00002B94 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32928 00002B97 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32929                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32930                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32931                                  
 32932                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32933                                  
 32934 00002B9A BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32935 00002B9D 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32936 00002BA0 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32937                                  ;scan_next
 32938                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32939                                  scannext:
 32940 00002BA2 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32941 00002BA6 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32942                                  	
 32943 00002BA8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32944 00002BAA 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32945 00002BAF 40                      	inc	ax
 32946 00002BB0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32947                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32948                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32949 00002BB2 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32950                                  got_last:
 32951                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32952                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32953 00002BB4 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32954                                  
 32955 00002BB9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32956                                  	;clc
 32957                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32958                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32959                                  	; cf=0
 32960                                  	;clc
 32961 00002BBF C3                      	retn
 32962                                  
 32963                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32964                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32965                                  ;	;stc
 32966                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32967                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32968                                  ;	; cf=1
 32969                                  ;	;stc
 32970                                  ;	retn

 32972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32973                                  ;
 32974                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32975                                  ;
 32976                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32977                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32978                                  ;
 32979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32980                                  
 32981                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32982                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32983                                  	; ds = cs
 32984 00002BC0 833E[771E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32985                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32986 00002BC5 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32987 00002BC7 06                      	push	es
 32988 00002BC8 53                      	push	bx
 32989                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32990                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32991                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32992                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32993 00002BC9 8B1E[7B1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32994 00002BCD 2B1E[771E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32995 00002BD1 8E06[771E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32996                                  	
 32997 00002BD5 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32998 00002BD8 CD21                    	int	21h
 32999                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33000                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33001                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33002 00002BDA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33003 00002BDC 48                      	dec	ax
 33004 00002BDD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33005 00002BDF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33006 00002BE6 5B                      	pop	bx
 33007 00002BE7 07                      	pop	es
 33008                                  su_exit:
 33009 00002BE8 C3                      	retn
 33010                                  
 33011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33012                                  ;
 33013                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 33014                                  ;
 33015                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 33016                                  ;
 33017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33018                                  
 33019                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33020                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33021                                  	; ds = cs
 33022 00002BE9 1E                      	push	ds
 33023 00002BEA 06                      	push	es
 33024                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33025 00002BEB 803E[931E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33026                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33027 00002BF0 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33028                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33029 00002BF2 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33030                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33031 00002BF6 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33032 00002BFB 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33033                                  ulu_next:
 33034 00002C00 E839FF                  	call	get_next
 33035 00002C03 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33036 00002C05 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33037 00002C07 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33038 00002C09 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33039 00002C0B EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33040                                  ulu_found:
 33041                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33042 00002C0D C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33043                                  ulu_x:
 33044 00002C12 07                      	pop	es
 33045 00002C13 1F                      	pop	ds
 33046 00002C14 C3                      	retn

 33048                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33049                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33050                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33051                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33052                                  
 33053                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33054                                  ;
 33055                                  ; Summary:
 33056                                  ;
 33057                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33058                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33059                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33060                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33061                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33062                                  ;
 33063                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33064                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33065                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33066                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33067                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33068                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33069                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33070                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33071                                  ;
 33072                                  ; Example:
 33073                                  ;
 33074                                  ;   [menu]
 33075                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33076                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33077                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33078                                  ;
 33079                                  ;   [network]
 33080                                  ;   include misc
 33081                                  ;   device=foo
 33082                                  ;
 33083                                  ;   [misc]
 33084                                  ;   device=bar
 33085                                  ;   include alternate
 33086                                  ;
 33087                                  ;   [alternate]
 33088                                  ;   device=tar
 33089                                  ;
 33090                                  ;
 33091                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33092                                  ;
 33093                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33094                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33095                                  ;
 33096                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33097                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33098                                  ;   following order:
 33099                                  ;
 33100                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33101                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33102                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33103                                  ;
 33104                                  
 33105                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33106                                  
 33107                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33108                                  
 33109                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33110

 33259                                  	je	short done_line
 33260                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33261                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33262                                  
 33263                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33264

 33584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33585                                  ;
 33586                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33587                                  ;
 33588                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33589                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33590                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33591                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33592                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33593                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33594                                  ;
 33595                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33596                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33597                                  ;
 33598                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33599                                  ;
 33600                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33601                                  
 33602                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33603                                  
 33604                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33605                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33606                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33607                                  	; ds = cs
 33608                                  	
 33609 00002D2C 06                      	push	es
 33610                                  
 33611 00002D2D 0E                      	push	cs
 33612 00002D2E 07                      	pop	es
 33613                                  
 33614 00002D2F 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33615 00002D31 8A1E[7834]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33616 00002D35 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33617 00002D38 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33618                                  
 33619 00002D3A C706[7B34]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33620                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33621                                  got_80:

 33685 00002D7E 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33686                                  
 33687                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33688                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33689                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33690                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33691                                  
 33692                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33693                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33694                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 33699 00002D8C 7502                    	jne	short not_144m

 33702

 33704                                  
 33705                                  ;	check for 320K
 33706

 33719

 33724                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33725                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch

 33743

 34074 00002EB4 74F9                    	je	short get_cmt_token ; (we are allowing the other special
 34075 00002EB6 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9 	;  characters can used for comment id.
 34076 00002EB8 74F5                    	je	short get_cmt_token ;  character.)
 34077 00002EBA 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='		; = is special in this case.
 34078 00002EBC 74F1                    	je	short get_cmt_token
 34079 00002EBE 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 34080 00002EC0 7426                    	je	short get_cmt_end ; cannot accept the carriage return
 34081 00002EC2 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34082 00002EC4 7422                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34083                                  
 34084                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34085                                  	; ds = cs
 34086                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt1],al	; store it
 34087                                  	;mov	byte [cs:cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 34088 00002EC6 A2[CE03]                	mov	[cmmt1],al	; store it
 34089 00002EC9 C606[CD03]01            	mov	byte [cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 34090 00002ECE E8A600                  	call	get2

 34092 00002ED3 7413                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34093 00002ED5 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9

 34097 00002EDD 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf  ; 0Ah
 34098 00002EDF 740E                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34099                                  
 34100                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34101                                  	;inc	byte [cs:cmmt]

 34103 00002EE1 A2[CF03]                	mov	[cmmt2],al

 34105                                  
 34106                                  get_cmt_end:
 34107 00002EE8 E88C00                  	call	get2
 34108 00002EEB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34109 00002EED 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 34110                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 34111 00002EEF E9DAFE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 34112                                  
 34113                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 34114 00002EF2 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 34115 00002EF6 47                      	inc	di
 34116 00002EF7 E9D2FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 34117                                  
 34118                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 34119 00002EFA 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 34120 00002EFE 47                      	inc	di			; and
 34121 00002EFF AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.

 34123

 34127 00002F09 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34128 00002F0B EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 34129                                  
 34130                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 34131 00002F0D E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 34132 00002F10 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34133                                  
 34134 00002F12 E86200                  	call	get2
 34135 00002F15 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)

 34137 00002F1A EB08                    	jmp	short org51

 34142 00002F21 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 34143                                  
 34144                                  org51:
 34145 00002F24 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 34146 00002F25 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 34147 00002F27 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 34148 00002F29 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 34149 00002F2B 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 34150                                  					; M051 - Start
 34151                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34152                                  	; ds = cs
 34153 00002F2D 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH

 34167

 34171

 34173                                  	; 04/01/2023

 34184                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34185 00002F60 E982FE                  	jmp	org1

 34189                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0

 34192 00002F6A C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0

 34200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34201                                  ;
 34202                                  ; procedure : get2
 34203                                  ;
 34204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34205                                  
 34206                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34207                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34208                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34209                                  get2:
 34210 00002F77 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34211                                  	;
 34212                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34213                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34214                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34215 00002F79 26                      	es	
 34216 00002F7A AC                      	lodsb
 34217                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34218                                  	;inc	si
 34219                                  	;
 34220 00002F7B 49                      	dec	cx
 34221 00002F7C C3                      	retn
 34222                                  noget:
 34223 00002F7D 59                      	pop	cx
 34224                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34225                                  	; ds = cs
 34226                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34227                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34228 00002F7E 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 34229 00002F82 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34230 00002F86 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34231                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34232 00002F88 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34233                                  
 34234                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34235                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34236                                  ;;	retn
 34237                                  ;;else
 34238                                  ;
 34239                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34240                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34241                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34242                                  ;
 34243                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 34244                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 34245                                  ;;endif
 34246                                  
 34247                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34248 00002F8C C3                      	retn

 34250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34251                                  ;
 34252                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34253                                  ;
 34254                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34255                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34256                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34257                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34258                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34259                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34260                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34261                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34262                                  ;
 34263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34264                                  
 34265                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34266                                  
 34267                                  skip_comment:
 34268 00002F8D E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34269                                  
 34270                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34271                                  	; ds = cs	
 34272                                  
 34273 00002F8F 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34274                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34275 00002F94 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34276                                  
 34277 00002F96 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34278                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34279 00002F9B 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34280                                  
 34281 00002F9D 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34282                                  	
 34283 00002FA0 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34284                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34285 00002FA4 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34286                                  
 34287 00002FA6 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34288                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34289 00002FAB 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34290                                  
 34291 00002FAD 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34292                                  	
 34293 00002FB1 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34294                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34295 00002FB5 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34296                                  skip_cmmt:
 34297 00002FB7 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34298 00002FB9 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34299 00002FBC 46                      	inc	si
 34300 00002FBD 49                      	dec	cx
 34301 00002FBE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34302 00002FC0 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34303                                  no_commt:
 34304 00002FC2 C3                      	retn

 34306                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34307                                  %if 0
 34308                                  
 34309                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34310                                  
 34311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34312                                  ;
 34313                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34314                                  ;
 34315                                  ;   INPUT
 34316                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34317                                  ;
 34318                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34319                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34320                                  ;
 34321                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34322                                  ;       All
 34323                                  ;
 34324                                  ;   HISTORY
 34325                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34326                                  ;
 34327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34328                                  
 34329                                  kbd_read:
 34330                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34331                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34332                                  
 34333                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34334                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34335                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34336                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34337                                  kbd_loop:
 34338                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34339                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34340                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34341                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34342                                          int     16h             ;
 34343                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34344                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34345                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34346                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34347                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34348                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34349                                  
 34350                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34351                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34352                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34353                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34354                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34355                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34356                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34357                                          int     16h             ;
 34358                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34359                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34360                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34361                                          inc     bx
 34362                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34363                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34364                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34365                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34366                                          int     16h             ;
 34367                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34368                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34369                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34370                                  
 34371                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34372                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34373                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34374                                  	
 34375                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34376                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34377                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34378                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34379                                          call    print
 34380                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34381                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34382                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34383                                  kbd_notf5:
 34384                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34385                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34386                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34387                                  
 34388                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34389                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34390                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34391                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34392                                          call    print           ;
 34393                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34394                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34395                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34396                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34397                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34398                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34399                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34400                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34401                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34402                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34403                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34404                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34405                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34406                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34407                                          retn			;
 34408                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34409                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34410                                          retn			;
 34411                                  
 34412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34413                                  ;
 34414                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34415                                  ;
 34416                                  ;   INPUT
 34417                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34418                                  ;
 34419                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34420                                  ;       None
 34421                                  ;
 34422                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34423                                  ;       None
 34424                                  ;
 34425                                  ;   HISTORY
 34426                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34429                                  
 34430                                  set_numlock:
 34431                                          push    ax
 34432                                          push    ds
 34433                                          sub     ax,ax
 34434                                          mov     ds,ax
 34435                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34436                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34437                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34438                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34439                                          jmp     short set_done
 34440                                  not_off:
 34441                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34442                                          stc
 34443                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34444                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34445                                  set_done:
 34446                                          pop     ds
 34447                                          pop     ax
 34448                                          retn
 34449                                  
 34450                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34451                                  
 34452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34453                                  ;
 34454                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34455                                  ;
 34456                                  ;   INPUT
 34457                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34458                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34459                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34460                                  ;
 34461                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34462                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34463                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34464                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34465                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34466                                  ;
 34467                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34468                                  ;       All
 34469                                  ;
 34470                                  ;   NOTES
 34471                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34472                                  ;
 34473                                  ;   HISTORY
 34474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34475                                  ;
 34476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34477                                  
 34478                                  menu_check:
 34479                                  
 34480                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 34481                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34482                                  
 34483                                          push    cx              ;
 34484                                          push    si              ;
 34485                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34486                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34487                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34488                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34489                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34490                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34491                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34492                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34493                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34494                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34495                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34496                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34497                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34498                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34499                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34500                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34501                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34502                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34503                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34504                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34505                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34506                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34507                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34508                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34509                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34510                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34511                                          call    get_char        ;
 34512                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34513                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34514                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34515                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34516                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34517                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34518                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34519                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34520                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34521                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34522                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34523                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34524                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34525                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34526                                          pop     si              ;
 34527                                          pop     cx              ;
 34528                                  
 34529                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34530                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34531                                  
 34532                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34533                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34534                                  ;
 34535                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34536                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34537                                  ;
 34538                                          call    kbd_read
 34539                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34540                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34541                                  
 34542                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34543                                  
 34544                                  menu_search:
 34545                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34546                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34547                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34548                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34549                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34550                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34551                                  
 34552                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34553                                  
 34554                                  menu_color:
 34555                                          push    cx              ;
 34556                                          push    dx              ;
 34557                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34558                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34559                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34560                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34561                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34562                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34563                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34564                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34565                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34566                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34567                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34568                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34569                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34570                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34571                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34572                                  check_color:                    ;
 34573                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34574                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34575                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34576                                  set_color:
 34577                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34578                                          pop     dx              ;
 34579                                          pop     cx              ;
 34580                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34581                                  
 34582                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34583                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34584                                  
 34585                                  menu_found:
 34586                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34587                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34588                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34589                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34590                                  
 34591                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34592                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34593                                  
 34594                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34595                                  
 34596                                  menu_process:
 34597                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34598                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34599                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34600                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34601                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34602                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34603                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34604                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34605                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34606                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34607                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34608                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34609                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
