 35642                                          pop     ax              ;
 35643                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35644                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35645                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35646                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35647                                  
 35648                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35649                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35650                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35651                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35652                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35653                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35654                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35655                                          jmp     short print1
 35656                                  not_up:
 35657                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35658                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35659                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35660                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35661                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35662                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35663                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35664                                  print1: 
 35665                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35666                                  print2: 
 35667                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35668                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35669                                  to_input_key:
 35670                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35671                                  not_down:
 35672                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35673                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35674                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35675                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35676                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35677                                          call    show_status     ;
 35678                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35679                                  not_f8:
 35680                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35681                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35682                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35683                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35684                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35685                                  
 35686                                  normal_key:
 35687                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35688                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35689                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35690                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35691                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35692                                          retn			;
 35693                                  not_backspace:
 35694                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35695                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35696                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35697                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35698                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35699                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35700                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35701                                          jmp	short print2
 35702                                  
 35703                                  select_done:
 35704                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35705                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35706                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35707                                  
 35708                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35709                                  
 35710                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35711                                  
 35712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35713                                  ;
 35714                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35715                                  ;
 35716                                  ;   INPUT
 35717                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35718                                  ;
 35719                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35720                                  ;       None
 35721                                  ;
 35722                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35723                                  ;       None
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ;   NOTES
 35726                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35727                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35728                                  ;
 35729                                  ;   HISTORY
 35730                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35731                                  ;
 35732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35733                                  
 35734                                  disp_input:
 35735                                          push    ax
 35736                                          cmp     al,' '
 35737                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35738                                          mov     al,' '
 35739                                  disp_ok:
 35740                                          mov     dl,al
 35741                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35742                                          int     21h
 35743                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35744                                          call    print
 35745                                          pop     ax
 35746                                          retn
 35747                                  
 35748                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35749                                  
 35750                                  disp_num:
 35751                                          push    bx
 35752                                          add     al,'0'
 35753                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35754                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35755                                          mov     cx,1
 35756                                          int     10h
 35757                                          pop     bx
 35758                                          retn
 35759                                  
 35760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35761                                  ;
 35762                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35763                                  ;
 35764                                  ;   INPUT
 35765                                  ;       None
 35766                                  ;
 35767                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35768                                  ;       None
 35769                                  ;
 35770                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35771                                  ;       None
 35772                                  ;
 35773                                  ;   NOTES
 35774                                  ;       None
 35775                                  ;
 35776                                  ;   HISTORY
 35777                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35778                                  ;
 35779                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35780                                  
 35781                                  show_status:
 35782                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35783                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35784                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35785                                          int     10h             ;
 35786                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35787                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35788                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35789                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35790                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35791                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35792                                          int     10h             ;
 35793                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35794                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35795                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35796                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35797                                  show_onoff: 
 35798                                          int     10h
 35799                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35800                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35801                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35802                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35803                                  
 35804                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35805                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35806                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35807                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35808                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35809                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35810                                          int     10h             ;
 35811                                  show_done:                      ;
 35812                                          pop     dx              ;
 35813                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35814                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35815                                          pop     bx              ;
 35816                                          retn			;
 35817                                  
 35818                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35819                                  
 35820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35821                                  ;
 35822                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35823                                  ;
 35824                                  ;   INPUT
 35825                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35826                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35827                                  ;
 35828                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35829                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35830                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35831                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35832                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35833                                  ;
 35834                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35835                                  ;       AX
 35836                                  ;
 35837                                  ;   NOTES
 35838                                  ;       None
 35839                                  ;
 35840                                  ;   HISTORY
 35841                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35842                                  ;
 35843                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35844                                  
 35845                                  skip_token:
 35846                                          call    get_char
 35847                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35848                                          call    any_delim
 35849                                          jne	short skip_token
 35850                                  skip_check_eol:
 35851                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35852                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35853                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35854                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35855                                          clc
 35856                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35857                                  	retn
 35858                                  skip_token_eol:
 35859                                          stc
 35860                                  skip_token_done:
 35861                                          retn
 35862                                  
 35863                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35864                                  ;
 35865                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35866                                  ;
 35867                                  ;   INPUT
 35868                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35869                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35870                                  ;
 35871                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35872                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35873                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35874                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35875                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35876                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35877                                  ;
 35878                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35879                                  ;       AX
 35880                                  ;
 35881                                  ;   NOTES
 35882                                  ;       None
 35883                                  ;
 35884                                  ;   HISTORY
 35885                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35886                                  ;
 35887                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35888                                  
 35889                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35890                                          call    get_char        ;
 35891                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35892                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35893                                          call    delim           ;
 35894                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35895                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35896                                  
 35897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35898                                  ;
 35899                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35900                                  ;
 35901                                  ;   INPUT
 35902                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35903                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35904                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35905                                  ;
 35906                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35907                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35908                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35909                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35910                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35911                                  ;
 35912                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35913                                  ;       AX
 35914                                  ;
 35915                                  ;   NOTES
 35916                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35917                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35918                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35919                                  ;
 35920                                  ;   HISTORY
 35921                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35922                                  ;
 35923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35924                                  
 35925                                  skip_opt_line:
 35926                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35927                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35928                                       
 35929                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35930                                  
 35931                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35932                                  ;
 35933                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35934                                  ;
 35935                                  ;   INPUT
 35936                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35937                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35940                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35941                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35942                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35943                                  ;
 35944                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35945                                  ;       AX
 35946                                  ;
 35947                                  ;   NOTES
 35948                                  ;       None
 35949                                  ;
 35950                                  ;   HISTORY
 35951                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35952                                  ;
 35953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35954                                  
 35955                                  skip_line:
 35956                                          call    get_char
 35957                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35958                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35959                                          jne	short skip_line
 35960                                  skip_line_done:
 35961                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35962                                          retn
 35963                                  
 35964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35965                                  ;
 35966                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35967                                  ;
 35968                                  ;   INPUT
 35969                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35970                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35973                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35974                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35975                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35976                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35977                                  ;
 35978                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35979                                  ;       AX
 35980                                  ;
 35981                                  ;   NOTES
 35982                                  ;       None
 35983                                  ;
 35984                                  ;   HISTORY
 35985                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35986                                  ;
 35987                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35988                                  
 35989                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35990                                  
 35991                                  get_number:
 35992                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35993                                  num_loop:
 35994                                          call    get_char        ;
 35995                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35996                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35997                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35998                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35999                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36000                                          push    ax              ;
 36001                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36002                                          push    dx              ;
 36003                                          mul     bx              ;
 36004                                          pop     dx              ;
 36005                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36006                                          pop     ax              ;
 36007                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36008                                          cbw                     ;
 36009                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36010                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36011                                  
 36012                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36013                                  ;num_done:
 36014                                          ;retn
 36015                                  
 36016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36017                                  ;
 36018                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36019                                  ;
 36020                                  ;   INPUT
 36021                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36022                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36023                                  ;
 36024                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36025                                  ;       AL == next character
 36026                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36027                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36028                                  ;
 36029                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36030                                  ;       AX
 36031                                  ;
 36032                                  ;   NOTES
 36033                                  ;       None
 36034                                  ;
 36035                                  ;   HISTORY
 36036                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36037                                  ;
 36038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36039                                  
 36040                                  get_char:
 36041                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36042                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36043                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36044                                  	es	
 36045                                  	lodsb
 36046                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36047                                          retn			;
 36048                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36049                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36050                                  nearby_ret:
 36051                                          retn
 36052                                  
 36053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36054                                  ;
 36055                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;   INPUT
 36058                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36059                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36060                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36061                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36064                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36065                                  ;
 36066                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36067                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36068                                  ;
 36069                                  ;   NOTES
 36070                                  ;       None
 36071                                  ;
 36072                                  ;   HISTORY
 36073                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36074                                  ;
 36075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36076                                  
 36077                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36078                                  query_user:
 36079                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36080                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36081                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36082                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36083                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36084                                  qu_1:
 36085                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36086                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36087                                          push    ax                      ;
 36088                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36089                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36090                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36091                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36092                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36093                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36094                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36095                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36096                                  query_all:
 36097                                  
 36098                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36099                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36100                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36101                                  
 36102                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36103                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36104                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36105                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36106                                  
 36107                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36108                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36109                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36110                                  find_match:                             ;
 36111                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36112                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36113                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36114                                          inc     di                      ;
 36115                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36116                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36117                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36118                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36119                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36120                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36121                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36122                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36123                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36124                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36125                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36126                                          inc     di                      ;
 36127                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36128                                          int     21h                     ;
 36129                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36130                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36131                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36132                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36133                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36134                                  cmd_notset:
 36135                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36136                                  line_print:                             ;
 36137                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36138                                          es
 36139                                  	lodsb
 36140                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36141                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36142                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36143                                  non_null:                               ;
 36144                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36145                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36146                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36147                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36148                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36149                                  non_space:                              ;
 36150                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36151                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36152                                          int     21h                     ;
 36153                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36154                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36155                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36156                                  
 36157                                  generic_prompt:
 36158                                          call    print                   ;
 36159                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36160                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36161                                          int     16h                     ;
 36162                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36163                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36164                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36165                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36166                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36167                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36168                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36169                                  not_func:
 36170                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36171                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36172                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36173                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36174                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36175                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36176                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36177                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36178                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36179                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36180                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36181                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36182                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36183                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36184                                  
 36185                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36186                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36187                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36188                                  	clc
 36189                                  do_cmd:
 36190                                  	pop     ax			;
 36191                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36192                                  	; cf=0
 36193                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36194                                  	retn
 36195                                  
 36196                                  skip_cmd:
 36197                                  	pop     ax			;
 36198                                  skip_all:
 36199                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36200                                  	stc
 36201                                  	retn
 36202                                  
 36203                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36204                                  ;
 36205                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36206                                  ;
 36207                                  ;   INPUT
 36208                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36209                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36210                                  ;
 36211                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36212                                  ;       None
 36213                                  ;
 36214                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36215                                  ;       None
 36216                                  ;
 36217                                  ;   NOTES
 36218                                  ;       None
 36219                                  ;
 36220                                  ;   HISTORY
 36221                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36222                                  ;
 36223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36224                                  
 36225                                  print_error:
 36226                                          push    ax
 36227                                          push    bx
 36228                                          push    cx
 36229                                          push    dx
 36230                                          push    ds
 36231                                          push    cs
 36232                                          pop     ds
 36233                                          pushf
 36234                                          call    get_linenum
 36235                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36236                                          call    error_line
 36237                                          popf
 36238                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36239                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36240                                          call    print
 36241                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36242                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36243                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36244                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36245                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36246                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36247                                  pe_1:     
 36248                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36249                                          call    print
 36250                                  pe_ret: 
 36251                                  	pop     ds
 36252                                          pop     dx
 36253                                          pop     cx
 36254                                          pop     bx
 36255                                          pop     ax
 36256                                  	retn
 36257                                  
 36258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36259                                  
 36260                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36261                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36262                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36263                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36264                                  
 36265                                  disable_autoexec:
 36266                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36267                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36268                                  
 36269                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36270                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36271                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36272                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36273                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36274                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36275                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36276                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36277                                  dae_1:
 36278                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36279                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36280                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36281                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36282                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36283                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36284                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36285                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36286                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36287                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36288                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36289                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36290                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36291                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36292                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36293                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36294                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36295                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36296                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36297                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36298                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36299                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36300                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36301                                          retn
 36302                                  
 36303                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36304                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36305                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36306                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36307                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36308                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36309                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36310                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36311                                  
 36312                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36313                                  
 36314                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36315                                  
 36316                                  
 36317                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36318                                  
 36319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36320                                  ;
 36321                                  ; procedure : delim
 36322                                  ;
 36323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36324                                  
 36325                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36326                                  ;
 36327                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36328                                  ;
 36329                                  ;any_delim:
 36330                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36331                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36332                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36333                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36334                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36335                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36336                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36337                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36338                                  ;
 36339                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36340                                  
 36341                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36342                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36343                                  delim:

 36348 00002FC9 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36349                                  
 36350                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36351 00002FCB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 36356 00002FD5 7407                    	je	short delim_ret

 36434                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36435                                  
 36436                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36437                                  mapcase:
 36438 00002FFF 51                      	push	cx
 36439 00003000 56                      	push	si
 36440 00003001 1E                      	push	ds
 36441                                  
 36442 00003002 06                      	push	es
 36443 00003003 1F                      	pop	ds
 36444                                  
 36445                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36446                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36447                                  ;
 36448                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36449                                  ;;else
 36450                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36451                                  ;;endif
 36452                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36453 00003004 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36454                                  
 36455                                  convloop:
 36456 00003006 AC                      	lodsb
 36457 00003007 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36458 00003009 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36459 0000300B 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36460 0000300D 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36461 0000300F 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36462 00003011 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36463                                  noconv:
 36464                                  
 36465                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36466                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36467                                  ;;
 36468                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36469                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36470                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36471                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36472                                  ;;
 36473                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36474                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36475                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36476                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36477                                  ;check_eol:
 36478                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36479                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36480                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36481                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36482                                  ;;endif
 36483                                  	
 36484                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36485 00003014 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36486                                  convdone:
 36487 00003016 1F                      	pop	ds
 36488 00003017 5E                      	pop	si
 36489 00003018 59                      	pop	cx
 36490 00003019 C3                      	retn

 36606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36607                                  ;
 36608                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36609                                  ;
 36610                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36611                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36612                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36613                                  ;
 36614                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36615                                  
 36616                                  getnum:
 36617 0000308D 53                      	push	bx
 36618 0000308E 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36619                                  b2:
 36620 00003090 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36621 00003093 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36622                                  
 36623 00003095 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36624 00003096 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36625                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36626                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36627 00003097 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36628 00003099 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36629 0000309B 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36630 0000309C 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36631 0000309E 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36632 000030A1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36633                                  
 36634 000030A3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36635                                  
 36636 000030A4 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36637 000030A7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36638 000030A9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36639 000030AB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36640 000030AD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36641 000030AF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36642 000030B1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36643 000030B3 7417                    	je	short b15
 36644 000030B5 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36645 000030BA 7410                    	je	short b15
 36646 000030BC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36647                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36648                                  	;nop
 36649                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36650                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36651                                  	;nop
 36652                                  	;nop
 36653 000030BE 740C                    	je	short b15
 36654 000030C0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36655 000030C2 7408                    	je	short b15
 36656 000030C4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36657 000030C6 7404                    	je	short b15
 36658 000030C8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36659 000030CA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36660                                  b15:
 36661 000030CC 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36662 000030D1 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36663                                  b1:
 36664 000030D6 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36665 000030D8 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36666 000030DA 5B                      	pop	bx
 36667 000030DB C3                      	retn
 36668                                  badnum:
 36669                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36670                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36671 000030DC 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36672                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36673 000030DE 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36674 000030E2 5B                      	pop	bx
 36675 000030E3 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36676 000030E4 C3                      	retn
 36677                                  
 36678                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36679                                  
 36680                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36681                                  
 36682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36683                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36684                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36685                                  ;	si = 0
 36686                                  ;	ax = country id
 36687                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36688                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36689                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36690                                  ;
 36691                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36692                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36693                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36694                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36696                                  
 36697                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36698                                  
 36699 000030E5 57                      	push	di
 36700 000030E6 50                      	push	ax
 36701 000030E7 52                      	push	dx
 36702                                  
 36703 000030E8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36704 000030EA 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36705 000030EC B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36706 000030EF E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36707 000030F2 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36708                                  
 36709 000030F4 06                      	push	es
 36710 000030F5 56                      	push	si
 36711                                  
 36712 000030F6 0E                      	push	cs
 36713 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 36714                                  
 36715 000030F8 BF[5C33]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36716 000030FB B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36717 000030FE F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36718                                  
 36719 00003100 5E                      	pop	si
 36720 00003101 07                      	pop	es
 36721 00003102 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36722                                  
 36723 00003104 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36724 00003107 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36725 0000310A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36726                                  
 36727 0000310C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36728 0000310D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36729 0000310F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36730 00003112 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36731 00003115 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36732 00003118 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36733                                  
 36734 0000311A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36735 0000311C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36736 00003120 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36737                                  
 36738 00003122 46                      	inc	si
 36739 00003123 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36740 00003124 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36741 00003125 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36742 00003126 5F                      	pop	di
 36743                                  
 36744                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36745 00003127 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36746 0000312A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36747                                  
 36748                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36749                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36750                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36751 0000312C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 36752 0000312E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 36753 00003130 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36754 00003133 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36755                                  
 36756                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36757 00003135 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36758 00003137 46                      	inc	si
 36759 00003138 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36760 00003139 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36761                                  
 36762                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36763                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36764 0000313B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 36765                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36766 0000313C F9                      	stc
 36767 0000313D C3                      	retn
 36768                                  
 36769                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36770 0000313E 5E                      	pop	si
 36771 0000313F 59                      	pop	cx
 36772 00003140 5F                      	pop	di
 36773 00003141 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36774                                  
 36775                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36776 00003143 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36777                                  
 36778                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36779 00003146 2E8916[6433]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36780 0000314B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36781 0000314E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36782 00003151 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36783 00003154 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36784 00003157 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36785

 36787 0000315B 46                      	inc	si

 36789                                  
 36790                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36791 0000315D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info

 36794

 36802 00003171 F9                      	stc

 36804 00003174 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36805                                  
 36806 00003176 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36807 00003179 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36808 0000317C B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36809 0000317E F9                      	stc
 36810 0000317F CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36811 00003181 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36812                                  
 36813 00003183 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36814 00003185 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36815                                  
 36816 00003187 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36817 0000318A 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]

 36819 00003190 F9                      	stc

 36821 00003193 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36822                                  
 36823 00003195 56                      	push	si
 36824 00003196 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36825 00003199 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36826 0000319B 5E                      	pop	si
 36827 0000319C BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36828 0000319F 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36829 000031A2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36830 000031A4 F9                      	stc
 36831 000031A5 CD21                    	int	21h
 36832 000031A7 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36833                                  
 36834 000031A9 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36835 000031AB 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36836                                  
 36837 000031AD 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.

 36939                                  getcountrydestination:
 36940                                  
 36941                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36942                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36943                                  ;
 36944                                  ;input: al - data id
 36945                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36946                                  ;on return:
 36947                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36948                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36949                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36950                                  
 36951                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36952                                  
 36953 0000320A 51                      	push	cx
 36954                                  	;add	di,74
 36955 0000320B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36956                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36957 0000320E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36958 00003211 47                      	inc	di
 36959 00003212 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36960                                  
 36961                                  getcntrydest:

 36970

 37006                                  
 37007                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37008                                  
 37009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37010                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37011                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37012                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37013                                  ;
 37014                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37015                                  ;	 be moved.
 37016                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37017                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37018                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37019                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37020                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37021                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37022                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37023                                  
 37024 00003235 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37025 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37026 00003239 F9                      	stc
 37027 0000323A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37028 0000323C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37029 0000323D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37030                                  
 37031 0000323F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37032 00003241 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37033 00003243 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37034 00003245 F9                      	stc
 37035 00003246 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37036                                  ricb_exit:
 37037 00003248 C3                      	retn
 37038

 37043                                  %if 0
 37044                                  
 37045                                  set_country_path:
 37046                                  
 37047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37048                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37049                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37050                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37051                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37052                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37053                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37055                                  
 37056                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37057                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37058                                  
 37059                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37060                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37061                                  
 37062                                  	push	si
 37063                                  
 37064                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37065                                  	push	es
 37066                                  	pop	ds
 37067                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37068                                  
 37069                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37070                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37071                                  
 37072                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37073                                  	inc	si
 37074                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37075                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37076                                  
 37077                                  scp_default_drv:
 37078                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37079                                  	int	21h
 37080                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37081                                  
 37082                                  scp_setdrv:
 37083                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37084                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37085                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37086                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37087                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37088                                  
 37089                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37090                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37091                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37092                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37093                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37094                                  
 37095                                  scp_root_dir:
 37096                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37097                                  scp_path:
 37098                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37099                                  
 37100                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37101                                  scpath_exit:
 37102                                  
 37103                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37104                                  	push	es
 37105                                  	pop	ds
 37106                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37107                                  
 37108                                  	pop	si
 37109                                  	retn
 37110                                  
 37111                                  %endif
 37112
